name: Company of Heroes 2: Soviet Commander - Armored Assault Tactics
description: Soviet Commander - Armored Assault Tactics; Heavy and medium armor is supported by IL-2 attack aircraft. Enemy forces identified through radio intercepts. Il-2 Sturmovik Attacks: IL-2 Sturmovik will loiter over the battlefield, strafing targets of opportunity with its powerful 23mm cannons.

name: Company of Heroes 2: OKW Commander - Elite Armor Doctrine
description: OKW Commander - Elite Armor Doctrine; Use superior equipment and experienced crewmen to augment your armored forces. Plan your tactics with Signal Relay or recover your armor with an Emergency Repair. Use the Sturmtiger to spearhead the assault. Signal Relay: Boosting signal range briefly reveals enemy vehicles on the mini-map.

name: Company of Heroes 2: OKW Commander - Fortifications Doctrine
description: OKW Commander - Fortifications Doctrine; Hold back the enemy at all costs with heavy defensive structures. Infantry can construct advanced defensive buildings. Heavy weapons such as the Pak43 can be combined with zeroing artillery to zone out and eradicate breakthroughs. leFH 18 Artillery: This light 10.

name: Company of Heroes 2: OKW Commander - Scavenge Doctrine
description: OKW Commander - Scavenge Doctrine; Gather whatever resources you can from the battlefield and defeated enemies. Troops are trained to be more thorough in their salvage operations while infiltrating light infantry can disrupt enemy supplies and lay traps.

name: Company of Heroes 2: US Forces Commander - Mechanized Company
description: US Forces Commander - Mechanized Company; Light vehicles provide valuable support to advancing American infantry units. Take advantage of a wide range of light US vehicles along with air support, as the battle escalates withdraw lighter units to replace them with more armored counterparts.

name: Company of Heroes 2: US Forces Commander - Rifle Company
description: US Forces Commander - Rifle Company; The Rifleman is the backbone of the American army emphasizing the American doctrine of versatility and individual firepower. Riflemen receive additional time in training to be more experienced against multiple threats as well as having access to more versatile weapon packages.

name: Company of Heroes 2: Soviet Commander - Partisan Tactics
description: Soviet Commander - Partisan Tactics; Make use of the Soviet Partisan network to harass enemies from behind the lines while destroying them with the soviet main army. Mark Vehicle: Targeted vehicle is subject to an increase in focused fire from nearby opponents.

name: Company of Heroes 2: Soviet Commander - Tank Hunter Tactics
description: Soviet Commander - Tank Hunter Tactics; Disable enemy tanks and armored vehicles more easily with a variety of upgrades and abilities to support existing AT options. Conscripts gain increased versatility against tanks, when that fails IL-2 planes can deliver a devastating anti-tank bombing run.

name: Company of Heroes 2: Soviet Commander - Terror Tactics
description: Soviet Commander - Terror Tactics; A pantheon of combat forces guaranteed to cause fear in your enemy. IL-2 Precision Bombing Strike: The IL-2 will make a high-speed bombing run, clustering four FAB-50 50kg bombs into the target area.

name: Company of Heroes 2: German Commander - Spearhead Doctrine
description:
German Commander - Spearhead Doctrine; Crush enemy defenses with heavy armor and powerful airstrikes. Recon enemy concentrations for mortar halftracks.
Fragmentation Bomb: High-explosive fragmentation bombs are dropped on the target location. Tiger Tank: Allows the requisition of the Tiger Heavy Tank to the battlefield.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - MP Pack 2
description: This addition to multiplayer functionality, includes three new competitive modes and six maps, for those modes.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Skirmish Pack
description: This DLC is a Skirmish pack with two new game modes: "Trench Assault " and "Team Defence "

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Honor of the Empire
description: In the Austria-Hungary campaign You will go through the horrors of the siege of Przemyśl, bloody battles on Isonzo's banks, the chilling cold of Tyrol and the heat of the Romanian plains.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - MP Pack 1
description: Set of 10 additional multiplayer maps.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Real War
description: Feel the most realistic atmosphere of the Great War for free!

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - French Campaign
description: The first campaign of the series - Battle of Empires: France - is devoted to the battles between the French and German armies on the Western Front.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - German Campaign
description: In the new campaign, you'll be able to see the war from the perspective of an ordinary officer. You will have to fight alongside Turkish and Austrian troops against the Serbian and Italian armies.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Battle of Cambrai
description: Historical multiplayer reconstruction, dedicated to the offensive of the Entente forces at Cambrai in 1918.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - British Empire
description: British campaign covers the Anzac battle path from 1915 to 1918. Battles under the scorching sun in Gallipoli, in flooded trenches of Flanders and in the ruins of the towns of Picardy await you. The first tank attacks, sabotage operations, large-scale infantry battles and hill assaults.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Russian Empire
description: The second campaign - Battle of Empires: Russian Empire - is devoted to the battles between the Russian and German armies on the Eastern front. Both of these campaigns are included in the base game.

name: Dan Sisal's 501 Darts Trainer
description: Welcome to Dan Sisal's 501 Darts Trainer! The darts game for when you can't make it to the pub.

name: Enchanted Kingdom: The Secret of the Golden Lamp - Collector's Edition
description: Can you save your dad from a genie bent on revenge?

name: Vega Conflict: Paladin Pack
description: As the flagship of the AXIS Project, the Paladin Carrier is a perfect combination of offensive firepower and dynamic support, featuring an interchangeable Support Field and Harmonic Fleet wide bonuses.

name: Vega Conflict: Paragon Battleship Pack
description: The true firepower of the Altairian faction, Paragon Battleships trigger their explosive Barrage Overdrive when surrounded, ensuring they never go down without a fight.

name: Vega Conflict: Bastion Cruiser Pack
description: The formidable Bastion Cruiser hulls boast built-in Counter-Chain and the Firestorm Overdrive which unleashes devastating damage when your shields drop.

name: Vega Conflict: Dread Battleship Pack
description: Ready to rule the galaxy with an iron fist? Check out the Dread Pack: a one of a kind array of weaponry, resistance tech, and high value gold. The Dread Battleship will allow you to take the fight to your enemies.

name: Vega Conflict: Exterminator Pack
description: Exterminator Destroyers are a highly sought-after hull for base sniping and PvE Outpost combat. Their tremendous range is boosted even further by the Xeno Shatter Driver. Any base you want to destroy? Destroy it.

name: Vega Conflict: Exodus Pack
description: Jump start your epic war in space with the Exodus Pack! Buy now and get Exodus Cruisers! These ships will make a fine armada for any new rebel.

name: Vega Conflict: Cavalier Cutter Pack
description: The swiftest Altairian hull, the Cavalier Cutters are the ultimate defence against stasis, their Catalyst Overdrive converting stasis energy into shield defense and speed.

name: Vega Conflict: Punisher Cruiser Pack
description: The most essential piece of any Xeno Division fleet is the brutal, all-purpose Punisher Cruiser. Now is the time to get yours! Pick up this pack to receive 3 Punisher Cruisers, as well as a full complement of Xeno Disintegrator Cannons to rain down destruction upon the Alien menace.

name: GunBlocks
description: Stranded on a mysterious planet you need to find your ships lost cargo and collect resources to repair your ship and get off planet. Use tetrominos to make your way through the strange new world, solve puzzles and get to know its not too friendly inhabitants.

name: Raceway: Drag & Stock Racing
description: Fire up your engines and get ready to tear up the track in the world's fastest and most dangerous of all motorsports! Launch your funny car, top fueller, or stock car down quarter-mile straights, banked ovals and a host of other wild circuits. With plenty of game modes and insane stunts to master, Raceway: Drag & Stock Racing offers all the high-speed, tyre blistering action.

name: Faction Wars
description: A grid based single / local multiplayer strategy game where two factions clash in deadly turn based battles.

name: Remnants
description: Fight enemy drones in this action-filled shooter to obtain the key to freedom! Customize your weapon by combining the powers of the four elements, collect items, and perfect your strategy to overcome the barriers constructed by your enemies.

name: Dracula Frames
description: Dracula's castle consists of 8 floors. Each floor has a large picture with a magnificent painting representing landmarks of Dracula's life. Your goal is to rebuild each painting through a slide puzzle and get to the top floor!

name: Max, an Autistic Journey: Max's Birthday
description: Spend a day with Max as he excitedly wakes up eager to celebrate his birthday!

name: Wonky Ship: Black Hole Down
description: Rock the Cat Ship with some purr-fect extras!

name: Dance of the Vampires
description:
With a jolt you wake, reaching from your subconscious mind for a pencil and a clean sheet of paper from the desk. Fumbling about with your fingers, however, you find not stationery, but the icicle-covered sleeve of uncle's coast.

Upon opening your eyes, the puzzle is solved. No longer are you in uncle's study at Koenigsberg University, taking notes and generally keeping busy helping uncle. You are now heading up a narrow track that winds on through gradually deepening woods and snow, on another one of uncle's “field trips”. This time researching a book on vampire bats and their connection with a strange race of humans.

This is of course of little interest to you, being neither of a very adventurous nature or possession of a strange stomach. However, the strange wolf cries coming from the trees around you and the general air of expectancy does grip you in a frightening sort of way.

Dance of the Vampires is an adventure game split into three chapters. The screen consist of the picture of the location that players are presently at, a description of that location, and a prompt where commands are entered. Recognizable commands include EXAMINE, TAKE, DRINK, ASK ABOUT, and directions can be abbreviated (ie: N, S, E, W, U, D).

name: Dark Disciples II
description:
DD2 is, unsurprisingly, the sequel to DD1. The look and feel is therefore similar to that of the first game. However a number of significant improvements have been made to the game system:

DD2 features a new story line (unconnected to that of DD1). It takes place over 4 continents and ~130 levels.

The game features non linear gameplay - feel free to explore (there are tons of side missions, secret areas and off the beaten track oddities to discover).
There is now a proper skill system. There are 11 skills available from Pick Locks, to Dual Weapons to Curse to Gemlore.
Monster AI has also be greatly improved (DD2 uses the A* pathfinding algorithm).
Monsters now have proper abilities (called 'powers'): they can shoot arrows and cast spells.
Speaking of arrows, missile combat has been implemented in DD2 (there were no missile weapons in DD1).
Also new is mp3 quality music (if you choose to download the 'music pack').
The level editor is more useful and much better laid out. It's now possible to completely design your own campaign using the editor, including importing new item, tile and monster pics.
A Bag of Holding has been implemented - characters can now carry twice as much once they have purchased the bag.
There are also 'super' monsters: 3x3 tiles in size!

name: Disharmony
description: An investigative Interactive Fiction journey into the unknown.

name: Malfunction FPS
description: In Malfunction FPS, your job is to defeat the robots and escape the robots to get to a door at the end of each level.

name: Awaken: Chaos Era
description: Enter the mythical world of Awaken, an ancient land held together only by the elements that brought it into existence. Peace is now being torn apart as the former King has disturbed the balance and brought the continent to the brink of destruction. As the constant struggle between light and darkness wages on, It's time to join the battle and awaken your inner hero!

name: Yes! PreCure 5
description: A turn-based strategy game in which the player moves the team members of Pretty Cure 5 around on a grid. Computer-controlled opponents are members of Nightmare and their Kowaina. The whole game is controlled through the touch screen of the DS.

name: Futari ha Pretty Cure Splash Star: Panpaka Game de Zekkou-chou!
description: A collection of many mini-games, divided into ten chapters. A number of games in each chapter needs to be cleared for the story to progress.

name: Vs. Ladies Golf
description: Vs. Ladies Golf is a port of Golf (NES) for the Nintendo Vs. System arcade.

name: Ardarium
description: Watch nations grow and forests spread in this casual sandbox game where everything is automatic and gameplay is optional. It's like a screensaver that you can play. Make explosions that deform the ground, start forest fires, trigger earthquakes that wipe out civilizations, or just watch the sunrise.

name: The Dawning Clocks of Time
description: A classic story of love, war and betrayal on an intergalatic scale. A epic turn based RPG with both sandbox and linear story progression. Take up arms with energy and exciting weapons and skills for the battle of the ages, who will decide the fate for all of humanity?

name: Neon Depth
description: In this puzzle-platform game, you must make mistakes in order to progress. Place blocks when you fail, and shape the level in your favor. Discover how to use blocks with different effects to escape from within yourself while learning to live with your mistakes.

name: Shine Within
description: A top-down action-adventure game as you collect & solve puzzles in order for you to explore & unravel this mysterious world.

name: Big Klondike: Classic Solitaire
description:
Big Klondike is a version of the very popular Klondike variation of solitaire. This version of solitaire is what generally is called Windows Solitaire, or what some people think Solitaire just is as a general term (when the truth is that Solitaire is a huge genre of games just as wide as FPS is).

Big Klondike features 1 Draw, 3 Draw, Random shuffles and Winnable shuffles. You can choose to have the Timer enabled or not if you prefer a relaxing experience.

Our Winnable shuffles are originally Random shuffles which our custom coded solitaire bot has play tested to ensure is actually possible. We ship the game with 50,000 known Winnable shuffles for both 1 Draw and 3 Draw variations. The 1.0.0 version of our solitaire bot was made to not be too incredibly clever, so all Winnable shuffles are guaranteed to be possible below 200 moves. Though a Winnable game is guaranteed to be possible, that does not mean you will always win it first time as sometimes moves can be made in ways where the game becomes bricked - impossible to finish in that state. If that happens you can Retry that same game and go for different moves to beat it!

In Big Klondike, cards can be dragged or clicked to move them to possible moves. Right click is also supported.

Once a game is deemed as mostly complete, Big Klondike will show a button to Auto Complete the game and move the rest of the cards into place in the foundations.

name: Smash MAGA! Trump Zombie Apocalypse
description: Anti-fascist gamers fight the Trump Zombie plague in this spree of rioting and looting!

name: Bubble Breaking
description: Bubbles come in different sizes (depths) and they rise at different speeds. Players have 60 seconds to pop as many as they can. When bubbles are popped points are scored. The smaller, faster bubbles score more points than the bigger, slower bubbles. Beware of the 'stink' bubbles.

name: Brambles in the Mist
description: In this SRPG, you play as a bard traveling in a foreign land in search of your muse. During your journey, you will meet numerous women to serve as your muses and also have romantic interactions with them. Faced with a common enemy that threatens the kingdom, you fight together to save it.

name: Crusader Kings II: Finno-Ugric Unit Pack
description: Crusader Kings II: Finno-Ugric Unit PackEnhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Finno-Ugric Unit Pack. The Finno-Ugric Unit Pack adds seven new, unique unit models for Finnish, Lappish, Komi, Samoyed and Mordvin rulers.

name: WWE 2K17: Future Stars Pack
description: Future Stars Pack:Play as 5 of WWE’s brightest new Superstars. The Future Stars pack features Austin Aries, Karl Anderson, Luke Gallows, Mojo Rawley, and Tye Dillinger.

name: Hybrid Wars: Yoko Takano
description: Up your game with a whole new character, a high-level specialist in tech-espionage and corporate security: Yoko Takano. Take on wave after wave of enemy forces using her unique skills and arsenal.

name: Hybrid Wars: Yana 'Tesla' Radovich
description: Get your hands on this exclusive hero, a famous technoblogger and promoter of all things futuristic: Yana “Tesla” Radovich. Jump into a future where those with the quickest wits and biggest guns survive.

name: The Lion's Song: Episode 2 - Anthology
description: In "Episode 2 - Anthology" you play as the aspiring painter Franz who has a unique but unsettling ability to see the hidden layers of his subjects' personalities. Can he overcome his fears and self-doubt to finally see himself?

name: The Lion's Song: Episode 4 - Closure
description: "Episode 4 – Closure", will take players on a mysterious train journey that brings together four strangers and connects the storylines of all three previously released episodes. What stories will they share along the way and where will their journey end?

name: The Lion's Song: Episode 3 - Derivation
description: In "Episode 3 – Derivation", you take on the role of Emma, a brilliant mathematician, who struggles to make her voice heard in the male-dominated world of academics at the beginning of the 20th century. Can she lift the curtain of reality to get a glimpse of the principles governing her world?

name: Logistical 2: Suriname - Xmas 2018
description: Logistical: Suriname - Xmas 2018 is a small add-on module for Logistical 2 that covers a couple of tiny countries on the north end of South America. Suriname is the first module to fully make use of the road upgrading ability. There are many businesses and towns that would be so much easier to do if the roads took bigger trucks.

name: Logistical 2: Vampires - Bundle
description: This Logistical 2: Vampires has over 1000 towns and 16,000 businesses to complete PLUS there are Vampires. Vampires are slowly taking over the country. Provide resources for the towns people to help push back the vampires to where they belong within Romania.

name: Logistical 2: Mall Rats
description: This Logistical 2: Mall Rats has over 150 towns and 1,000 businesses to complete. There are many malls throughout the United States of America. Mall Rats (teenagers) require large amounts of resources from these malls. Complete the malls to unlock critical resources to further unlock more of the map.

name: Logistical 2: Indonesia - Bundle
description: Logistical 2: Indonesia spans many islands in a wonderful tropical climate. Build your truck empire to cover the many islands and help the local tourism industries.

name: WWE 2K17: Legends Pack
description: Legends Pack: Expand your roster and play as some of the greatest legends in WWE history with the WWE 2K17 Legends Pack. Playable legends include Brutus “The Barber” Beefcake, Eddie Guerrero, Greg “The Hammer” Valentine, Sycho Sid, and Tatanka.

name: WWE 2K17: NXT Enhancement Pack
description: NXT Enhancement Pack: Playable characters Apollo Crews, Nia Jax and Shinsuke Nakamura Earn a 50% boost in points earned for your MyCareer Superstar while in NXT!

name: WWE 2K17: Hall of Fame Showcase
description: Hall of Fame Showcase:Relive some of WWE’s most historic matches featuring the 2016 Hall of Fame Class and also get new playable characters, attires, and arenas! Matches include Sting vs Ric Flair (1988), Cactus Jack and Diamond Dallas Page vs. The Fabulous Freebirds (1992), Papa Shango vs. The Godfather, Big Boss Man vs.

name: WWE 2K17: Accelerator
description: AcceleratorDecide the overall rankings and attribute levels of every WWE Superstar and Legend in the game. Unlock every WWE Superstar and Legend, including alternate attires with the Accelerator pack!

name: WWE 2K17: New Moves Pack
description: New Moves Pack:Over 50 new moves to add to your arsenal! Stun your opponents with the Swingout Neckbreaker like Charlotte, dive off the top rope with a Zack Ryder Elbro Drop, or give your opponent a Face Wash Combo like Samoa Joe.

name: MotoGP 13: MotoGP Champions
description: MotoGP Champions gives you the opportunity to race as, and against, legendary riders of the past, including Doohan, Schwantz, Rainey, Spencer, Gardner, Capirossi and many others. Ride their historical 2 stroke 500 CC bikes and experience all the excitement of being a Motogp legend.

name: MotoGP 13:Red Bull Rookies Cup
description: The Red Bull Rookies Cup will add this exciting competition to the game.Since its inception in 2007 it has grown into one of the most thrilling 2 wheel spectacles in the world. Teenagers from around the world know that the best way of getting a start in Grand Prix motorcycle racing is by entering the Red Bull MotoGP Rookies Cup.

name: MotoGP 14: Red Bull Rookies Cup DLC
description: The Red Bull Rookies Cup will add the game this exciting competition.

name: MotoGP 14: Donington Park British Grand Prix DLC
description: The MotoGP14 Donington Park British Grand Prix pack adds this sensational circuit to the game.

name: MotoGP 15: GP de Portugal Circuito Estoril
description: Inaugurated in 1972, the Estoril circuit hosted the MotoGP from 2000 to 2012, the same year Jorge Lorenzo set the circuit record.

name: Valentino Rossi: The Game - Real Events: 2015 MotoGP Season
description: This additional content will allow you to relive the most exciting events of the 2015 MotoGP season.

name: MotoGP 20: Historic Pack
description: Buy the Historic Pack and compete with four of the most iconic riders of MotoGP history and their bikes!

name: MotoGP 19: Historical Pack
description: Purchase the Historical Pack and relive the thrilling challenges of the 1992 season!

name: MotoGP 21: Limited Edition Liveries
description: Purchase Limited Edition Liveries and compete with five iconic riders and their exclusive bikes. Unique liveries created for special events during their careers.

name: Invisible: Story Extension
description: Get Deeper into the Story from Invisible with the Story Extension DLC.

name: Battlerite Royale: All Champions Pack
description: The Royale All Champions Pack unlocks all of the current and future Champions featured in Battlerite Royale.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft Seychelles XP
description: The Seychelles are a group of islands in the Indian Ocean but what comes into most people’s minds when they think about the name is a tropical paradise, luxurious holidays, excellent diving spots and breathtakingly beautiful nature.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Champions Character Pack
description: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes from the Marvel teenage superheroes group Champions: Ironheart, Devil Dinosaur, Moon Girl, Viv Vision, Amadeus Cho, Wasp (Nadia Pym), Hawkeye (Kate Bishop), and Nova.

name: The Alpha 001
description: Dive into the simulation, explore, play mini games, break loot boxes, grow plantations on your farm, fight orcs, play with your friends, rescue robots, increase your village's population, mine resources, conquer villages! The simulation will prepare a lot of different things for you, get ready.

name: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes - Leader Pack DLC
description: The Leader Pack adds an all-new sovereign to each of the game’s 10 factions, each of which provide fresh gameplay experiences with new abilities and items.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: British GT Pack
description: The BRITISH GT PACK DLC brings all the action of the 2019 British GT Championship by SRO Motorsports Group to Assetto Corsa Competizione and it includes 3 new circuits: Donington Park, Oulton Park and Snetterton. Furthermore , mixed class racing is included into the new version of ACC.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2020 GT World Challenge Pack
description: The 2020 GT WORLD CHALLENGE PACK DLC adds a new track, two new cars, more than 60 new liveries and all teams of the 2020 GT World Challenge season in ACC, alongside with the new Pirelli 2020 "DHE" Tyre Model, new season BoP, improved AI algorithms and optimized overall performance.

name: Zooma:Chapter 4 - "Temple of the Damned"
description: Nobody is welcome at the Temple, and only the moans of ghosts and the breath of the volcano that slowly devours the once-mighty fortress break the silence. Do you have what it takes to defeat the prehistoric evil and revive this dark stronghold to its previous glory?

name: Zooma:Chapter 3 - "Shadow Valley"
description: Shadow Valley. Gentle wind rustles the tree leaves in the twilight valley. Take a walk along the river, draw a deep breath of fresh air: it will give you strength and make your aim true, so you are better prepared for the upcoming challenge.

name: Zooma: Chapter 2 - "Cave"
description: Enter the cave and have no fear: cannibal outcasts may be living here, but they won’t harm you. A former mine is now abandoned, although still rich in resources. The reason for that was the whispers workers would start hearing after spending a few days underground. Don’t waste a moment, hurry up, and finish all your business in this god-forsaken place without delay!

name: Void Destroyer 2: Big Red
description: The Big Red DLC expands the Void Destroyer 2 ship line up with additional ships from the Digger faction.

name: Void Destroyer 2: Ashes
description: The Ashes DLC expands the Void Destroyer 2 ship line up with additional ships and a base from an unknown faction.

name: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes - Battlegrounds DLC
description: Enhance your tactical battles and map options with this new DLC. Adds more than a dozen new tactical battle maps and over 20 new stamps to expand the random map generator.

name: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes - Quest Pack DLC
description: New creatures, quests, weapons, armor, events and more can be yours with the Quest Pack DLC for Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes.

name: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes - The Dead World DLC
description: Take command of the Empire of the Dead and lead them to grim victory as your undead armies strike fear into their mortal counterparts. Includes new monsters, spells and monsters to play with or against.

name: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine
description: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine is an Action-Adventure Metroidvania. The game features decision making, crafting, fast-paced combat, multiple endings, intricate storytelling, an open world to explore, and more!

name: Day of the Dimetrodon
description: A short little game about a day in the life of the prehistoric predator Dimetrodon.

name: Death Wore Endless Feathers
description:
Jakob is a hacker for Sector H, a new branch of Black Sun, a crypto-anarchistic organisation that looks after its own.

Funded by mysterious benefactors, Jakob and the rest of Sector H break open ractives to ensure that everyone can play them. It's a dog-eat-dog political minefield that Jakob wants no part of.

All Jakob wants to do is play ractives, watch the new Ripsaw Bloodgore concert, and have fun. He has no place in this war - but fate conspire against him, dragging him into the very core of this matter. He will never forget the day

DEATH WORE ENDLESS FEATHERS.

name: Derelict
description:
Derelict is a first person shooter and a tactical action game inspired by Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels. The player controls a group of 5 space marines in two ways: directly in first person view (with the keyboard and mouse) or by giving them orders via map view (primarily with the mouse). Each marine has its own skills and abilities:
Communications: the communications specialist can see enemies in the map screen.
Heavy Assault: carries a belt fed Gatlin Cannon which doesn't need to be reloaded.
Demolition: the demolition expert carries a modified rifle with a grenade launcher attached, which power can rip apart obstacles and temporarily disrupt teleportation systems.
Engineer: carries automated tools to repair doors and can hack security system faster than the other marines.
Medic: can heal the other team members and has a hazard suit which allows him to walk through dangerous areas.
The player can switch among the marines any time by pressing the proper hot keys or using the mouse wheel. While controlling a marine, the others will be AI controlled.

The game has a total of 20 levels and five difficulty ranks, from private to general, and the harder the rank, the more frequently enemies respawn, the quicker they move and the slower the medic heals.

name: Dinner for Pigeons
description:
Dinner For Pigeons is a freeware, snack-size adventure game with candy-colored cartoon graphics and a gentle arcade slant.

Close your eyes. Imagine you are a pigeon. You are a hungry pigeon. Fortunately, these are the streets of plenty. So fly over to the diner and steal an evening meal from under people's noses. Try not to get killed in the process. That is this game.

name: Donald Dowell and the Ghost of Barker Manor
description: Donald Dowell is a nice old man in his eighties, retired for many years. Donald's life, except for his "intolerable" wife, is quiet. But Donald feels empty. He has the so-called retiree's syndrome : he's bored to death! The only way to cure his boredom is TO GO BACK TO WORK. After many hours spent in his city, trying to get hired for various jobs, he finally finds his calling: to be a GHOSTBUSTER! Donald will try to become Bob Delano's assistant (the most famous occult detective in Ireland), be involved in the investigation of Barker Manor and, hopefully, solve the mystery.

name: Don't Look!
description: My MAGS entry for December 2010: "Discovery" Little Sharon is afraid of the dark, what will await her when she goes to sleep? The game is done in 32-bit color, but I did stick to an 8-bit palette. Certain effects only work with 32-bit, so using that was necessary.

name: Doors
description: A long corridor with 5 Doors. You ask yourself what lies beyond? Just go exploring!

name: Draculator II: Byte of the Draculator
description: Corporal Merrick was on leave one evening and tried to hook up with some cute vampire twins. In an attempt to impress them, he allowed himself to be made into a vampire. Unfortunately his army found out and enrolled him in a secret experimental bionic implant program. Now half vampire, half robot, and more than half confused, Merrick must escape the base where he is being held or spend the rest of his life being drip-fed poodle blood to keep him obedient! Can you help Merrick escape?

name: Drak
description: Your car has broken down in front of Count Dracula's mansion, and since there is no help nearby, you decide to explore it. Drak is adventure game from ECP, with graphics in the form of Maniac Mansion. You move your character using the joystick and entering two-word commands with the keyboard. Some commands can be abbreviated, with two letter combinations of the noun and verb (eg: OP DO for OPEN DOOR). The object of this game is to escape the mysterious mansion before you are killed by Count Dracula's assistant, Egor.

name: Echoes of the Past
description: Point and Click Non-linear puzzles 10 Hours of gameplay 150+ Rooms to explore Over 60 Characters to interact with Collect and combine inventory items Captivating music and sound effects

name: Star Wars Racer and Commando Combo
description:
Get two classic Star Wars games with the Star Wars Racer and Commando Combo which includes Star Wars: Episode I Racer and Star Wars Republic Commando. Climb on, strap in, and experience the pure adrenaline-pumping excitement of the Podracing sequence from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace in Star Wars: Episode I Racer. In Star Wars Republic Commando you are the leader of your elite squad of Republic Commandos. Your mission is to infiltrate, dominate, and ultimately, annihilate the enemy.

Star Wars Episode I Racer: Choose from 25 playable racers including: Anakin Skywalker, Sebulba, and Ratts Tyerell
Star Wars Episode I Racer: Race tracks spanning 8 unique worlds including: Tatooine, Baroonda, and Malastare
Star Wars Republic Commando: Boss, Fixer, Scorch, and Sev, better known as Delta Squad, are back! Relive the legendary campaign
Star Wars Republic Commando: Battle a variety of highly intelligent and deadly enemies-from brutal Trandoshan mercenaries to the flying insectoid warriors of Geonosis

name: Egress - The Test of STS-417
description: Egress is a short form sci-fi adventure game set in the outer reaches of space. The story begins when you, the commander of a two man recon team, are sent hurtling into space during maintenance on an interplanetary probe. After a sudden attack from an black alien substance, you awake on a mysterious planet. Where are you? How did you get there? And why is your partner screaming for help down the intercom…

name: Emerald Eyes
description: "It all startet with a dream. I saw myself - standing in front of a swimming bath. I felt strange. I felt strong. I felt the desire to kill. I knew my victim. She was in there. She had to die, she had to drown. Water was the first element. I couldn't stop myself. I had to kill..."

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Reggio Calabria XP
description: Fly to the tip of Italy's distinctive boot shape with Reggio Calabria XP. This highly detailed scenery brings you to Reggio Calabria, named after Italian Royal Air Force war-hero Tito Minniti, who was born in Reggio Calabria.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - SAM FollowMe
description: Don't get lost on any airport by using SAM FollowMe service to guide you to your parking position.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - MKJS: Montego Bay Jamaica
description: In partnership with LatinVFR, Skyline Simulations brings you the very first detailed Jamaican airport for X-Plane 11.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Faroe Islands XP
description: The scenery Faroe Islands XP now recreates the entire archipelago for XPlane 11.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Sharm El-Sheikh XP
description: The popular Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport scenery from FSDG is now available for XPlane 11!

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - JustAsia: Real World Malaysia
description: Realworld Malaysia covers a whopping 330,803 km² and covers west and east Malaysia. JustAsia harness the lastest autogen technology especially for XPlane which allows for region specific houses, shops, highrise and buildings to be placed using XPlane built in OSM data to ensure maximum immersion.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - CRJ 200
description: The Canadair Regional Jet CRJ-200 is a short-range, single-aisle commuter jet and with 1021 built units the most popular regional jet today. The JRollon CRJ-200 brings this famous airliner to the simulator known for its accurate flight dynamics.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Mauritius
description: Paradise at its best - the unique Ile de Maurice, one of the most beautiful and scenic islands in the world, now available for XPlane!

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - Africa
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: Africa is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Africa Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - KSNA: John Wayne International
description: John Wayne International Airport (IATA: SNA, ICAO: KSNA, FAA LID: SNA) is located in Orange County near Los Angeles, USA. KSNA provides General aviation operations, commercial operations and several facilities.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - KCVG: Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International XP
description: Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport offers non-stop passenger service to 62 destinations with 179 peak daily departures. The airport's international destinations include Cancún, Cozumel, Freeport, Montego Bay, Paris, Punta Cana, Reykjavík, and Toronto.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Agadir
description: Agadir Al Massira - one of the biggest airports in Morocco and just a stone's throw away from the Canary Islands - now also available for XPlane!

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Helgoland XP
description: Helgoland XP is a scenery for XPlane 11 that recreates Germany's only island in the open sea at a high level of detail and with many thrilling new options.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Ibiza XP
description: Bring home some holiday feeling and enjoy the detailed airport as well as the fantastic sceneries of the two islands Ibiza and Formentera.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - German Islands 1: East Frisia
description: Discover the East Frisian North Sea islands with the new XPlane 11 add-on German Islands 1: East Frisia.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Aspen XP
description: This add-on contains the airport of Aspen with an extended runway, new taxiways, a fire station, a terminal, and hangars, all with high-resolution textures. You can furthermore explore dozens of custom local landmarks, like Aspen High School, Aspen Chapel, and the Aspen Recreation Center.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Paderborn XP
description: Explore the home airport of Aerosoft in XPlane 11 with Paderborn XP!

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Dortmund XP
description: Discover the centre of the Ruhr region in XPlane 11, the scenery Dortmund XP is a complete recreation of the city of Dortmund in the flight simulator.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft Svalbard4XPlane
description: Svalbard is a highly realistic recreation of the Svalbard islands for XPlane 11. The Norwegian archipelago in the Arctic Ocean is situated about midway between continental Norway and the North Pole. The islands range from 74° to 81° northern latitude, north of the Polar Circle. This area isn‘t covered by the XPlane default scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - Europe
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: Europe is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Europe Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Globall Art - CYYZ: Toronto Pearson International
description: Toronto Pearson International Airport (IATA: YYZ, ICAO: CYYZ), officially named Lester B. Pearson International Airport, is an international airport serving the city of Toronto, Ontario, Canada, the Greater Toronto Area, and the Golden Horseshoe, an urban agglomeration of 9.2 million people.

name: X-Plane 11: FACO Simulations - F-15C Eagle
description: If you think you only fly Airliners and GA: The archaic navigation system of the F-15C will give any pilot a challenge offering a fun way to practice those difficult instrument skills at a much faster pace!

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - St. Tropez
description: Based on the latest image sources, highly detailed objects were created at and along the airport. In addition, the villages La Mole and Le Moulin Roux were upgraded with individual autogen.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - SAM WorldJetways
description: Equip every standard airport in XPlane 11 with animated and fully functional passenger boarding bridges with this addition “SAM WorldJetways” to the popular Scenery Animation Manager. The animation is either manually or automatically.

name: X-Plane 11: 29 Palms/Captain7 - EDDN: Nuernberg XP
description: This add-on brings Bavaria's second largest international airport in an incomparably authentic and lively atmosphere to XPlane.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - South America
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: South America is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default South America Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - Asia
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: Asia is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Asia Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - XPRealistic v.2
description: XPRealistic V2 brings a whole new world of immersion into X-Plane. With a growing list of 40 realistic camera and sound effects, you will experience X-Plane like never before.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Graz
description: The international airport of Austria's second largest city Graz finally gets the Flight Simulator scenery it deserves! With more than 1 million passengers and a dozen major airlines visiting Graz-Thalerhof every year you are now able to join them.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Kapstadt XP
description: Cape Town International Airport is now available for XPlane 11!

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - North America
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: North America is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default North America Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Dakar
description: Welcome to one of the most modern airports in Africa with this stunning scenery of Blaise Diagne International Airport!

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Bremen XP
description: FSDG's most detailed scenery Bremen is now available for XPlane 11!

name: The Final Frontier
description: The Last Frontier is a retro multi-directional shooter inspired by the likes of Asteroids and Galaga. You destroy waves of endless enemies while trying to survive as long as possible by upgrading your ship's abilities along the way.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Halloween
description: Halloween adventure waits you in Holiday Jigsaw!

name: Halloween Riddles Mysterious Griddlers
description: Trick or treat? 120 terribly exciting nonograms in Halloween Riddles: Mysterious Griddlers! Horrribly fun!

name: HotGirls Sliding Puzzle
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring sexy girls and waitresses in a night club. Discover beautiful women in a nightclub setting by solving puzzles.

name: Prison Ball: Full Blown - Damon Blood
description: Damon Blood only cares about clearing the bricks so that he can make his way to his opponent on the other side hiding behind that paddle. But he knows that if he can avoid the blow attacks and get close enough that his enemies blood will spurt into the air with a quick strike!

name: WGT Golf: Birdie Bundle
description: Improving your short game is key to lowering your scores, and this heavily discounted bundle will get you on track toward more birdies.

name: Stratagem in troubled times
description: The main protagonist helps the princess to realize the rejuvenation and unification story, which contains a large number of strategy choices and a small number of turn based fighting, as well as a lot of small games, players can choose their own way to achieve it!

name: Battle Academy: Rommel in Normandy
description: This time, play the Normandy campaign from the other side and play as the Germans and their mighty Tigers through ten varied missions. Take command from the initial chaos of the airborne drops all the way through to the desperate escape from the Falaise pocket and learn the skills required to control an army stretched to its limit by...

name: Battle Academy: Operation Husky
description: Can you do better than General Patton and Montgomery? Open the attack on the soft underbelly of Europe in "Operation Husky", with nine missions detailing the invasion of Sicily. With more than 30 new units, and missions ranging from the chaos of the initial night drops to the grim battles across the baking hills of the...

name: Battle Academy: Operation Sealion
description: It is September 1940, and the Germans launch their invasion of Britain. In this fictional "What If?" Campaign , you command the Home Guard's desperate counterattacks against German glider troops and the tenacious defence of the South Coast Sea Front.

name: Battle Academy 2: Battle of Kursk
description: Battle of the Kursk is the first expansions for action-packed tactical masterpiece Battle Academy 2. It focuses on the key events of the Soviet counteroffensive and can be played from both sides: capture the station at Ponyri, the “little Stalingrad”, defend the road to Oboyan and launch the armoured charge at Prokhorovka

name: Battle Academy: Blitzkrieg France
description: Following the invasion of Poland, Germany opens the western front and invades France. It’s the Blitzkrieg, a new and dangerous form of warfare based on speed and aggression using concentrated mechanized forces to pierce the enemy lines and encircle them.

name: Battle Academy: Fortress Metz
description: In Battle Academy: Fortress Metz you play the forces of the US 3rd Army as it tries to encircle Metz and cause the city to capitulate. Ten missions based on historical situations will test your skills as a commander.

name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas - Collection Pack 2
description: Enhance your adventure and achieve victory with the Collection Pack 2. Complete your collection with new starships, pilots and weapons. The Collection Pack 2 includes the digital version of : - Skullscream Starship Pack - Vigilance Starship Pack - Vantage Starship Pack - Startail Pilot Pack - Haywire Pilot Pack - Gauss Gun Weapon Pack -...

name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas - Collection Pack 1
description: Enhance your adventure and achieve victory with the Collection Pack 1. The Collection Pack 1 includes the digital version of : - Nadir Starship Pack (pilot Shaid, Nadir starship and the Nullifier weapon) - Kharl Pilot - Eli Pilot - Hailstorm Weapon Pack (Hailstorm and Meteor Mk.2 weapons)

name: Sacred 3: Orc of Thrones
description: Play as Garok the orc, the true heir of the Orc Throne. This pack contains Garok the Orc as a fully playable character.

name: Sacred 3: Malakhim Hero
description: Play as Kython the Malakhim and reinforce the resistance with powerful blood magic. This pack contains Kython the Malakhim as a fully playable character.

name: Sacred 3: Underworld Story
description: Venture into the Underworld and find the mysterious tower guarded by the Black Seraphim. This pack contains 4 all-new missions set in the Underworld of Ancaria.

name: 3D MiniGolf: Candy Shop
description: New DLC "Candy Shopf" available! Sugar shock guaranteed!

name: Fort Defense: Bermuda Triangle
description: Take what you can, give nothing back! This time of the secrets of the Bermuda Triangle will submit to you.

name: Fort Defense: Atlantic Ocean
description: Battlestations! The pirates are preparing to board again! Surely you didn't think that the pirates would leave once and for all? Build towers, cast spells, collect barrels of rum and believe in victory!

name: Monitor: The Game - The Good Left The City
description: "I certainly hope you believe in something... ...every Story has to have an end...” The Good Left The City: the short novel conclusion to Alix: A MONITOR Story.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: All the Trappings - Challenge Pack 1
description: Four new challenge maps filled with hordes of undead enemies and devious traps you must maneuver and exploit to survive.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Things that Go Boom - Challenge Pack 2
description: Four new explosive challenge maps featuring a variety of tense puzzles, deadly traps, and relentless combat encounters.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Hazardous Reunion - Challenge Pack 3
description: Four new challenge maps featuring mind-boggling puzzles, waves of intense combat action, and a fiery reunion with an old friend.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Raziel and Kain Character Pack
description: Grab a friend or go at it alone as Kain and Raziel from the Legacy of Kain games. The two iconic characters must work together to defeat a new threat in an unfamiliar world.

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: Mission Pack 1 - Time of the Mutants
description: Prepare to challenge 26 of the most intense missions the EDF has ever faced! Some of these missions come from Earth Defense Force 2025, some are brand-new, but they all have one thing in common: They're really, really, REALLY hard. Can you survive the Time of the Mutants?

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: Mission Pack 2 - Extreme Battle
description: Every bug, bot and battleship in the Ravager arsenal is lined up to take a shot at you! Face a gauntlet of 23 missions — some new, some classic, all extreme!

name: Siberian Dawn: Mission Pack 1
description: Mission Pack 1 gives you the full Core game of Siberian Dawn, adding 9 new Units to the Union Bloc and 9 new Units to the Guild Bloc, along with the Bond system. Mission Pack 1 also includes the first 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story. The full Siberian Dawn Core experience.

name: Siberian Dawn: Mission Pack 2
description: Mission Pack 2 gives you 3 new full Missions, completing the first chapter of the Siberian Dawn story. Requires Mission Pack 1 to play.

name: Arma 3: Tac-Ops
description: Take part in three distinct military operations and influence the course of events with the Arma 3 Tac-Ops DLC Singleplayer Mission Pack.

name: Company of Heroes 2: Victory at Stalingrad Mission Pack
description: In the winter of 1942, the Red Army fought valiantly to hold the capital of Stalingrad against a seemingly unstoppable German advance. At great cost and against all odds, the Soviets managed to stop the fascist advance and began their counter attack with Operations Uranus and Little Saturn.

name: Company of Heroes 2: Southern Fronts Mission Pack
description: During the Spring Rasputitsa in early 1943, the Red Army launched a series of counteroffensives against German lines in the southwest. While initially successful, the Germans regrouped and managed to regain the momentum to recapture Kharkov.

name: Company of Heroes 2: Case Blue Mission Pack
description: After the long winter of 1941, the German Wehrmacht launched a massive summer offensive in June of 1942 codenamed “Case Blue”. The goal of this operation was to capture the oil-rich lands of the Caucasus region. Case Blue achieved spectacular early gains, but met with strong resistance around Stalingrad.

name: Time of Special Team
description: In 2035, Cauldron-City with only disorder and chaos remain. Assigned as a sniper of the confidential special team, you must remove the enemies covertly and accurately.

name: Deity
description: Play as a Deity on a meditative journey through various worlds. Embody a unique creature in each world and travel amidst ultra peaceful meditative music.

name: Endless Space 2: Dark Matter
description: From a series of quests investigating the strange events that preceded the fall of the Endless to simple problems of unruly subjects, enjoy the gamut of experiences and adventures from 12 new quests to discover, all set in the vast strangeness of the Endless Universe!

name: Endless Space 2: Untold Tales
description: Uncover hidden secrets, intriguing stories and endearing characters scattered across your Empire in Endless Space 2: Untold Tales with its 21 exclusive Quests, 4 new Minor Factions and 4 new Heroes. You will soon realize that while the Endless galaxy might be governed by a few powerful forces, it is still inhabited by masses of minority...

name: Endless World: Ice and Fire Mercenary Pack
description: This DLC includes two powerful mages with “ice and fire” elements respectively: snow queen EVA & fire elf FEU. They also bring you a great deal of rare resources

name: Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion
description: An old-school JRPG with a deep and mysterious storyline placed in a fictional dark city of Gris. Explore the story of four troubled souls and kill the abominations that threaten the existence of reality itself.

name: Soviet Arcade Machine Basketball
description: Computer simulation of one of the most recognizable arcade machines of the USSR times.

name: Far North
description:
Far North is a sandbox co-op procedural open world survival game with changing seasons.

Set in the deep North your survival depends solely on your ability to thrive.
Build and expand settlements in order to brave through the changing seasons ranging from beautiful summer days to fierce winter nights.e.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Season 1: Phalanx
description:
Each season of the game features free content updates, starting with Season 1: Phalanx, named for its new Class.

Season 1: Phalanx features the following free content:
New Class Kit: the combat shield-wielding "Phalanx", with 15 Kit-Specific Perks
4 New Weapons
New Cosmetic Rewards (head accessory, weapon colorways and decals)

name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Hungry Witch
description: Follow the journey of Kirana to save her unborn baby and defeat the evil power before it gains the power to ruin the world while surrounded by life-threatening events in the middle of the mythical Bali settings.

name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Little Devil
description: Experience Putri’s journey to get the inheritance in her grandfather’s old Javanese Dutch-colonial mansion while revealing what has happened to her mother’s family in the past.

name: Starward Rogue: Augmented
description: AuGMENTED is Starward Rogue, but bigger, better, and coated with gold. Newly added Gold Floors mysteriously appear throughout your run. Inhabited by rare enemies, unique treasures await those who can overcome the challenges within.

name: Steep: Winterfest Pack
description: Dress up for the craziest party in the Steep Alps! Shred the mountain with a brand new sport, customize your style with fun and crazy outfits, and get ready to test your skill in Winterfest’s insane exclusive challenges!

name: Steep: Rocket Wings DLC
description: Soar through skies and valleys in the Alps & Alaska at break-neck speed with 15 new challenges for every daredevil’s favorite sport, Rocket Wings! Get 3 exclusive customizations for your Rocket Wings so you can stand out from the other riders.

name: Steep: Extreme Pack
description: Take your STEEP experience to a brand new level, join the Icarus crew in a new story and own the skies with 3 adrenaline-fueled new sports, additional challenges and new customisation items included in the Extreme Pack!

name: Cloud Song: Saga of Skywalkers
description: Decide what life you want to have and embark on your journey - summon and collect pets, battle against enemies, customize to your heart’s content and explore the world in Cloud Song, a mobile MMORPG adventure SEA.

name: Three Kingdoms Simulator
description: A Three Kingdoms Simulator ARPG Game

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 3 Rome
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 4 Mayan
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 5 BigMix 1
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 1 Greece
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 2 Persia
description: New 30 levels.

name: Just Cause 4: Brawler Mech
description: The Brawler Mech is built for delivering swift destruction! Smash your way through Black Hand strongholds with the Brawler Mech's powerful punch.

name: Hashi: Light
description: Hashi:Light is a puzzle game for Window, Mac and Linux, which contains over 1000 challengeable puzzles.

name: Paper Tales: Catch Up Games
description: Paper Tales is a dynamic card game suitable for mobile. Build a comprehensive strategy and adapt the shape of your realm according to opportunities and restrictions and you will make history!

name: Ride: Yamaha Historical Bikes
description: Download the Yamaha Historical Bikes DLC Pack to receive the bikes that have defined the last 20 years of Yamaha motorcycle production.

name: Big Fish
description: Explore an underwater dystopian graveyard of giant creatures that once swam the seas. Eat your way to the top of the food chain and grow into a powerful creature of the deep in order to restore an ancient technology and save the ocean from the sunken city's pollution.

name: Hero Siege: Wrath of Mevius - Digital Collector's Edition
description: The Wrath of Mevius - Expansion Set (Digital Collector's Edition) Fight your way through Astral Plains, Corrupted Deserts to the Mansion of Mevius and face him in an epic battle that determines the fate of mankind!

name: Arm of Revenge Re-Edition
description: "Arm of Revenge" A arcade style platform action game, get more experience, learn new skills, upgrade equipment, Touching story, smooth moves, more than 30 skills to combo, 3 types of arm to change, survival mode...and more!, quickly with the hand of revenge kill all enemies.Enjoy it!

name: Escape Hospital
description: “My IV stings…who can I trust?” Created independently by Morning Drizzle M.D., artist behind the acclaimed Iatrophobia Facebook page, this game features a brand new storyline with familiar characters and art from the comic.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege - Ash Watch_Dogs Set
description: In the Ash Watch_Dogs Set you can make Ash embody a highly skilled hacker with Aiden Pearce's Scarf, Watch_Dogs charm and weapon skin.

name: Operation Desolate Void
description: Operation Desolate Void is a multiplayer FPS based around choosing the right weapons & equipment to head into a mission with to make it out alive.

name: Angle Soccer
description: It's all a matter of angle

name: Match3 mania!
description: Match3 mania! - a hardcore challenge for fans of the genre! Timekiller with a constant race against time, which is always short. Break blocks according to the rules of match3 games and collect big combos for extra seconds to help you reach incredible records!

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji
description: "It's fine, don't worry about it." These are common words said by Shinji, who is well-known around Hagiwara's campus for being a helpful guy. But when people misread his reliable nature for something more, he withdraws into himself.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi
description: Rejecting the path set before her by Professor Kazama, Tsubasa turns to her childhood friend Takumi for help in finding her mother – an enigma directly tied to Takumi’s brother, Yasu. Despite being targeted by an all-powerful vampire mafia, the pair follows the faint trails of evidence, spending night after night in the underworld,...

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya
description: Forced to take sides even as she tries to control on her unstable powers and emotions, Tsubasa is pulled into large scale business negotiations and the politics of the ancient Ryu clan. Can you navigate a path wrought with mysteries and drama to find happiness?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue
description: Fast forward two years to the future and see how life has changed for you and Tatsuya. While you've never been more in love, you're not quite as far along in the relationship as you'd hoped. After a romantic date though, your life changes forever. Can an old threat bring promises of a new, brighter future?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou Epilogue
description: It's been five months since the incidents at Caro mansion. Your relationship with Shou is going well and you even bring him along to meet your family. But there are still some things you feel Shou is keeping from you about his new life.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book 1
description: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe. In the process, you may just find yourself falling in love with a man who is anything but what you expected.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Deluxe Edition
description: Expand the Mystic Destinies experience with additional content!

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji Epilogue
description: One year after the events of the Spring Castle, you and Shinji are still together. You two seem to both be growing and changing and yet...there are still so many questions unanswered. Finally, you turn to the only one who may be able to help answer them. But even if you know the answer, will you be able to grasp the truth?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou
description: Despite his problems, Shou does his best to help support Tsubasa as she learns about her new world and how to control her powers. But as they grow closer, the two soon learn of an ancient threat lurking amidst the darkness: one that will take all of their abilities to stop, else they'll forfeit their very lives.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book II
description: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends - New Stage & Camp Symbol
description: 30 stages will be added to Free Mode. Additionally, a total of 10 new camp symbols based on themes such as the "Five Generals" and "Two Qiaos" will be added to Ambition Mode.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends - New Stage & Animal Pack
description: In Free Mode, 8 battlefields from previous Dynasty Warriors games are recreated for a total of 24 additional stages. In addition, unique animals such as Mammoth and Polar Bear can be obtained in the "Animal Battle" for each battlefield.

name: Lying Souls
description: Lying Souls is an atmospheric, mysterious single player story horror game. You'll dive into a story in which nothing is as it seems. Find out the reasons behind what happened to your family back then. Your decisions will guide the course of the story.

name: Aurora
description: Aurora is a precision platform game about how the Night takes her lost stars back to the skies.

name: Pog
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Inheritors2078
description: Inheritors 2078 is an RTS/TPS/FPS hybrid game with full Multiplayer & Co-op support, taking its events in the near future where the world is being dominated by evil robotic incarnates that were once enslaved by humans.

name: My Furry Dictator
description: Wake up, comrade, you arrived to the best country in the world! We have socialism, paws and most importantly - a hot dictator. Experience the story of a young billionare and his relationship with the most insane woman in his life!

name: Nonvilia
description: This game is in Japanese only.

name: Blob.io
description: The Most EPIC Blobs vs Blobs Online Action battles out here!

name: Talisman: The Reaper Expansion - Legendary Deck
description: Try to survive as death stalks the land of Talisman, with the Legendary Deck for the Reaper expansion.

name: Talisman: Legendary Deck
description: Make your adventures even more legendary than before, with new, extra challenging cards for Talisman: Digital Edition.

name: Talisman: The Highland Expansion - Legendary Deck
description: Face the true might of the Eagle King with this challenging Legendary Deck. Can you battle your way to the peak of the magical Highlands?

name: Talisman: Complete Runestone Deck
description: A complete set of Runestone cards, which give your Talisman characters extra abilities, for use in online and offline game modes.Designed to speed up a game of Talisman, and also make your characters more powerful, Runestones are cards which you can attach to your characters to give them the advantage over their opponents.

name: Super Kickers League: Vikings and Valkyries!
description: Super Kickers League : Vikings & Valkyries! brings nordics theme and elemental powers to Super Kickers League! Get two new teams with their own captains and abilities, as well as one new map (playable by day or by night) and new music !

name: Super Kickers League: Goths and Vampires!
description: Super Kickers League : Goths & Vampires! brings dark and spooky new content to Super Kickers League! Get two new teams with their own captains and abilities, as well as one new map (playable by day or by night) and new music !

name: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss: Expansion Pack
description: Add more to your Signed and Sealed With a Kiss experience with the Fashionista and Thrillseeker Boyfriend types!

name: Island Simulator 2016: Horror Pack
description: Horror Pack contains new scary story line and two new maps to explore. Are you ready for new adventure?

name: Dream Card
description: Dream Card combines the technology of blockchain with collectible Trading Card Game. In the X World Games ecosystem, every NFT card is openly and transparently recorded on the chain and belongs to a specific player. Players can customize their cards to have new attributes and designs, which improves the game's playability.

name: Prehistoric Life Puzzles
description: This puzzle game from the creators of Dinosaur Fossil Puzzles introduces now some wild species from the old times! Discover all fossil panels and take them to the Restore screen. Challenge the 3 levels! Two types of fossils are mixed on the level 3. If you have an unnecessary panel, put it into the trash can. You can discover many kinds of Prehistoric life species! This is your next step to become an archaeologist!

name: Cure Obsession
description: This is a stress relieving game

name: Nagare-boshi
description: NAGARE-BOSHI is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Vortex
description: Welcome to the VortexLabs testing facility. Here we will test your ability to solve various puzzles in order for you to make your escape.

name: Tiani
description: Virtual reality meets the world of old school role play where the powers good must fight and triumph over an evil power intent on the destruction of your lands magic and the death of your people.

name: Factory Defense
description: Factory Defence - is a first-person shooter in which you build automated factories and defend them. Plan your factory and defensive structures to take the enemy by surprise. Explore and colonize the planet alone or with friends.

name: Hunger
description: Hunger in Los Angeles is an immersive journalistic experience set in the heart of the city, where the indigent are trying to survive on an over-strained food distribution system. By embedding audio that was captured from the First Unitarian Church in an immersive 3D Unity scene, we become witness to a distressing event that unfolds.

name: Deep Excavation
description: Discover what happened during Cryosleep in Deep Excavation. Explore the unique mines that the planet brings and what lies with them. Escape the planet, and survive the creatures you encounter.

name: Blind_
description: This game is a grid-based puzzle with a twist: The layout of each level is hidden from you at the start of every room. 60 levels filled with various puzzles. Make determinations on your surroundings, project your moves, utilize mechanics of teleportation, wraparounds and more!

name: Bisque Doll
description: BISQUE DOLL is a Hong Kong urban legend About a year ago My mother bought a pair of bisque dolls That's for my sister's room decoration My grandma told me since I was young When you put away the bisque doll Don't keep her in a dark corner Or in the cabinet that nobody cares about

name: Noisz Re:Verse
description: Noisz Re:Verse is a new evolution and expansion for Noisz, featuring 12 challenging all-new stages, style customization for deeper scoring mechanics, and the epic conclusion to Noisz's storyline.

name: Ys V: Lost Kefin, Kingdom of Sand
description:
Ys V: Kefin, The Lost City of Sand is the fifth game of the series. It is a PS2 remake of the original game released in 1995 for the Super Famicom.

Adol is travelling through new lands, in search of more adventure, when he hears of the vanished desert city of Kefin. He sets off to investigate this ancient city's disappearance.

name: Football Manager 2022
description: The closest thing to real football management. FM22 brings new, progressive ways to find your winning edge, instill your footballing style and earn it on the pitch.

name: Magic Ring
description:
The legend speaks...。200 years ago, this Rainbow World was about to come to an end with the advent of the genie。The power of the genie was so great that I couldn't beat the sword as one of them。The genie obeyed seven servants and turned each kingdom into a strange world one after another。No more slippery, no more sadness, fear and despair, and the end of the world..。"Oh, God is not in this world..." Now, when the end of the world was about to come, a rainbow that was brighter than the sky fell。God entrusted the power of the rainbow to one man and gave birth to a hero。The hero sealed seven servants and, with the power of the rainbow, contained the genie toward him in the darkness。

This work is a real-time action game released in 1993。Players set out on an adventure in the world where the genie is about to revive, becoming the protagonist “sieve” who has been tailored to the hero in the “Hirder Academy”。

The game consists of top views, jumping, attacking, and using magic to fight and find the "rainbow fragments" scattered around the world..。There are a total of seven “rainbow fragments”, which not only give them special abilities such as dashes and aerial rest, but are also the key to the final stage。

8 stages in total。You'll leave the Brave Academy and aim for the castle of the Genie, but along the way you'll also enjoy the eyes with unique stages such as the country of sweets and haunted houses。

name: Sword of Symphony
description:
A music- action RPG cryptically connected to the story of ‘Purpose’

Created & solo-developed by Stephen Ddungu for his final year university project.

name: Sesame Street ABC & 123
description:
A compilation of both Sesame Street A B C and Sesame Street 1 2 3 release on the NES in (either June or November) 1991.

Included games:
Letter-Go-Round, a spelling and letter matching game
Ernie's Big Splash, a problem-solving and predicting game
Astro-Grover, a beginners math game
Ernie's Magic Shapes, a shape and color matching game.

name: Vigilance 2099
description: Vigilancer 2099 is a third-person Cyberpunk bounty-hunting game set in an isolated Megabuilding. Enter the skin, soul, and mind of your Vigilancer as you fight to stay alive long enough to pay off your bounty.

name: Score! Classic Goals
description: Football themed game made by First Touch Games released in 2012.

name: Meow Playground
description: Meow Playground is an online game that lets you play as a cute animal character. In the game, you have the opportunity to improve your character, communicate with other players, and participate in a variety of games and activities, such as fishing or playing tag and dodgeball. Additionally, you can customize and decorate your own house to your liking. With so many options and possibilities, Meow Playground offers endless fun for anyone who loves animals and online gaming!

name: Panic at Community
description: A mini-games collection to play with your viewers on live streaming

name: Burger & Frights
description: Burger & Frights is a short horror game in which the player rides a bike throughout a dark forest. The game was inspired by games such as Rides with Strangers, and a certain horror movie by John Carpenter.

name: Duck Jam
description: 5 second micro-games with an emphasis on humor.

name: Lovixsama Sokoban Bundle
description:
Nyakamon Adventures — help NyaKaMon to get through challenging levels of sokoban!
ReactorX is a relaxing game about moving boxes on energy grids in a sci-fi setting, in order to repair the space ship which was hit by a meteor.
Easy to play, exactly what you need to rest from the dynamics of big games; Level-design with no dead ends, so you don't have to restart any level except if you really want to start anew; Short animated cutscenes with story elements.

name: Far Cry 6: Yara Edition
description: Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. Far Cry 6 thrusts players into a modern-day guerrilla revolution. As dictator of Yara, Anton Castillo is intent on restoring his nation back to its former glory by any means, with his son, Diego, following in his bloody footsteps. Become a guerrilla fighter and liberate Yara. The Yara Edition of Far Cry 6 includes the entire game as well as the Crock Hunter Pack DLC.

name: Let's Sing 2022
description: Let’s Sing is back and this time on the new generation! Grab a microphone, some friends, and join the hottest karaoke game of the year!

name: Saints Row: Notorious Edition
description:
Welcome to Santo Also, a vibrant fictional city in the heart of the American Southwest. In a world rife with crime, where lawless factions fight for power, a group of young friends embark on their own criminal venture, as they rise to the top in their bid to become Self Made.

The notorious edition includes the following:
- Exclusive steelbook with game disc
- Expansion Pass
- Double-sided poster (66cm(W) x 39.3cm(H))
- Mini Artbook
- 4 Santo Ileso postcards
- 4 character art cards
- Bonus -Los Panteros American Muscle Bundle
- Bonus - The Saints Criminal Customs

name: Gran Turismo Sport: Limited Edition
description:
Gran Turismo Sport is the world's first racing experience to be built from the ground up to bring global, online competitions sanctioned by the highest governing body of international motorsports, the FIA (Federation International Automobile). Create your legacy as you represent and compete for your home country or favorite manufacturer.

The GT Sport Limited Edition includes the following items:
- GT Sport Starter Pack (8 Cars)
- $1MM In-Game Credit
- Livery Sticker Pack
- 30 GT Sport Themed Avatars
- Chrome Racing Helmet (For Driver Profile)
- Limited Steel Book & Packaging

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition Includes :

- Touhou Genso Wanderer Game for PS4 and Touhou Double Focus Game for PS4
- Touhou Genso Wanderer OST and Touhou Double Focus OST
- Full-color Hardcover Touhou Genso Wanderer Art Book and Full-color Softcover Touhou Double Focus Art Book
- Acrylic Standee and Reversible Cover

name: Horizon: Zero Dawn - Thunderjaw Collector's Edition
description: This edition includes the following Premium Packaging, Premium Thunderjaw Statue, Aloy's "Focus" Earpiece, Exclusive Litographs, and Exclusive World Map

name: Unravel Yarney Bundle
description: Discover the delightful adventures of Unravel and Unravel Two, with the Unravel Yarny Bundle.

name: We Sing Pop!: Solus Edition
description: Your Favourite Artists All in One Place

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Special Edition
description:
Horizon Forbidden West continues Aloy’s story as she moves west to a far-future America to brave a majestic, but dangerous frontier where she’ll face awe-inspiring machines and mysterious new threats.

Horizon Forbidden West: Special Edition includes:
- Full game
- SteelBook
- Mini art book
- Digital soundtrack

name: Measuring Up
description: Sin descripción

name: Hajwala Line
description: HAJWALA LINE Game that designed to match your requirements. New challenge make you collect coins and buy new cars and open new levels.

name: Cabous
description: A first-person thriller exploration game, based on a true story. Centered around the memory-driven nightmares of a young woman who has been imprisoned by her childhood trauma. Release all the memories locked in and beware of the creatures of the night.

name: Puzzle Light: Connect
description: Connect the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

name: The Top of the Dream
description: An TouHou style barrage shooting game, with a unique firepower and boundary mechanism, use of the mechanism and resources, in the difficult Stage and BossBattle to master the rhythm and explore the SpellCard ,to defeat the FinalBoss, uncover the veil of transformation, and see the "dream of the sky"

name: Chimeras: Cursed and Forgotten - Collector's Edition
description: You're off to Scotland in Chimeras: Cursed and Forgotten - Collector's Edition, a riveting hidden object puzzle adventure. Uncover more family secrets and enjoy additional Collector's Edition exclusives including collectible Tarot Cards, morphing objects, and more!

name: Zombies!
description: Zombies! A VR slasher/shooter adventure. Slay the zombies and discover clues about their origin.

name: Paradise Lust
description: 2D Point & Click Dating Adventure! Explore an idyllic tropical island with a cast of sexy beauty pageant contestants and their friends, discovering a paradise of survival, romance, and lust.

name: The Maiden, the Butler, and the Witch
description: A classic-style turn-based RPG. Irina must leave her home and embark on a journey to complete her training to become a witch. However, the Demon Lord has built a castle on the island, and unleashed monsters who threaten its citizens.

name: Track
description: This is a stealth based game where you will follow the mysterious man who kidnapped your boyfriend/husband/stepbrother, and to rescue them. It consists of three independent situational stories, each involving a heroine.

name: Smart Tracks: Think and Run
description: A fun puzzle that combines the careful analysis of physics and logic with the adrenaline of rally racing. Overcome obstacles, survive deadly curves, make the best time, whether on asphalt, mud or snow, and become a legend on the tracks!

name: Crossy Bridge
description: Crossy Bridge is an arcade survival race where you move across a bridge with floating platforms that you need to stop in time to drive over them.

name: Risen 2: Dark Waters - Treasure Isle
description: Embark on a brand new adventure in pursuit of the legendary treasure of Captain Steelbeard. Join Captain Steelbeard's daughter, Patty, on a journey to an unknown island that offers new environments to explore and many puzzles to solve, treasures to loot and mysteries to unravel.

name: Gongo
description: Gongo is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where the player goes through levels killing enemies and saving the princess. Each level has amazing hand-picked worlds. On each of the levels, a princess is hidden, which must be rescued and delivered to your castle, cleaning up enemies along the way.

name: Custam Sugoroku
description: A game of dice where you can create your own inside. Create your own map and save it to a file. Load the saved file and play with others.

name: Scramble
description: Scramble is a resource management game in which you compete against other companies for the colonization of the New World.

name: Trump vs. Covid: Save the World Clicker
description: Save the world from COVID with nukes!

name: PoliPlanet
