description: Set on small procedurally generated planets, PoliPlanet is a unique first-person city building game. Discover new planets, gather resources, craft, explore, and build to create a thriving interplanetary civilization!

name: Case 02: Paranormal Evil
description: A survival horror puzzle RPG. Roll your dice to perform checks for elements such as Willpower or Firepower, and save a girl in a hospital full of evil spirits and zombies.

name: Untangled: Payback
description: Untangled-Payback is an action-platformer about a deal that has gone wrong. Clyde, the main character of the game, is a gangster that got himself involved in a deal that costs him more than he thinks. Packed with his guns and skills, now he has to fight his way out to save himself and whomever he holds dear. He cannot stop until he reaches redemption and avenges the losses on his path.

name: Funanigans: Party Games
description: Funanigans has 8 different party games for 2+ players! Create a room, and everyone can join and play from a web browser - on a phone, tablet, computer, etc. Features 4 drawing games, drawing on a shared canvas, 3 team-based games, word games, no max player limits, and hours of fun!

name: Wilhelm Gustloff's Death
description: It is World War 2 and you are aboard the MV Wilhelm Gustloff which has just been struck with 3 torpedo strikes. You will relive the MV Wilhelm Gustloff's final moments in this atmospheric simulation.

name: The Garden of Orilon
description: Meet your engagements with the ones who keep watch on you. Your memories are sealed and soul binds to soft dolls. When the doll opens its eyes, the castle where it appears is under attack...

name: Orbis Sepia: The End of Worlds
description: Orbis Sepia: The End of Worlds is a roguelike strategy game playing in an infinite procedurally generated universe. As a giant creature the size of a planet, your only source of food is... planets! Explore the universe and eat planets to keep exploring, seek the purpose of your existance!

name: Seal World
description: Meet friendly seals, eat fibsh, swim, and relax! Become a seal!

name: The Niflhel Day
description: A visual novel in the setting of Slavic folklore in which you will walk through the forest at night, when the line between the world of the living and the dead is thinner than ever. Look carefully at your feet and, perhaps, you will see the dawn.

name: Far Cry 4: Overrun
description: Play as Rakshasa and Golden Path to swarm conflict zones, and overrun your opponents in maps based on Kyrat’s countryside. 4 new PvP maps, 1 new PvP mode and 1 new vehicle - the Buggy - included in PvP mode.

name: Demon Source
description: Demon Source is a soulslike roguelike game with procedural generated dungeons. Try new builds each run. Gather the Source to unlock new items and abilities. Solve the mystery of seven inhabitants of the Church. Try the Ultimate Challenge with great classical music. It is made by one person!

name: Demon Tamer
description: Tame beasts and demons, use them to fight other demons, train them, and win back your country.

name: Pack of Demons
description: Hi Gamers!We want to introduce You to our new project, inspired by an old classic video game but in a completely new truly 3D environment. We want to change it and move the challenge to a new level. Train Your spatial imagination with our 3D Game!.

name: Avoid the Demons
description: Welcome to hell with Avoid The Demons. Demons that come from all sides. This is a dangerous arena and your goal is to survive for as long as possible.

name: Seven Demons
description: Dive into an amazing adventure! The girls and people of the Kingdoms need your help! Learn new techniques. Rebuild your village, build dwellings for the needy. Free the people from slavery! A lot of quests, dangerous battles with bloodthirsty creatures, beautiful girls are waiting for you.

name: Cloud Island
description: Cloud Island is a linear game. You have to save your family, which was kidnapped by the hero's evil brother. As you progress through the plot, you will learn the story of the enmity between the brothers.

name: Demon Sighting
description: A point-and-click adventure with turn-based combat. Explore a demon-infested house and uncover a dangerous ritual. Encounter succubi, imps, priests and more on your quest to expose demons to the world. Short, replayable and sexy.

name: Shots Fired in the Dark Forest
description: You have to open doors, use teleports, dodge saws and shoot at intelligent hostile plants.

name: Police hot Tale
description: Undress the police girl enjoying the relaxing retrowave soundtrack.

name: Shots
description: Shots is a PvP action multiplayer shooter game with a lots of weapons!

name: The Heat of War
description: Another first person perspective title, referring to the events of the Second World War.

name: Leaf Me Alone
description: Leaf me alone is a game where a little cleaning robot tidies fallen leaves, empty cans and even toy ducks. This game can bring satisfaction even whilst you are resting. The exciting journey that you’re about to experience with your cute cleaning robot A-12 is now ready to start.

name: Leons Identität
description: Leons Identität (Leon's Identity) is a first-person adventure game which rigorously unfolds the drifting-off of a young man into the alt-right radical scene and his unexplained disappearance.

name: Phoenix Squadron
description: Take flight in the year 2074 after a devastating war that sent the planet into chaos, Leaving a blind eye to a large asteroid approaching the planet, After a ceasefire was called all parties involved in the conflict built 7 giant towers/nodes that can form a defensive shield and fire a giant laser, However... all the towers went offline just a few hours ago...

name: Submorse
description: Chill out in a submarine as you learn Morse code! Submorse is an atmospheric, first-person game that teaches you the international Morse signals.

name: Gowf
description: Gowf is an arcade style golf game with a classic 3-click hit system. Features an RPG style adventure mode where you can level-up and customize your character's skills and equipment to win tournaments across a variety of courses and online play with up to 8 friends.

name: Adventures With a Girl
description: The new tenant is a beautiful girl, be a gentleman and take care of her needs.

name: Dex Survival
description: Dex Survival is a single player Drone action game made by an Haitian indie game studio in Canada. The game is focus on quick combat and an enjoyable gameplay. You'll play as a little drone and be send to different mission to survive and defend.

name: RPG: Squad battle
description: Control 3 members super hero team, finish different missions and destroy evil bosses at different enviroments

name: Kaiju Krashers
description: Swim ashore to 22 challenging levels, finding the most streamlined way of collapsing every building on each island. Navigating your way through Hard Hitting Tanks, Turn Tracing Jet Missiles, and Tazer Death Rays to destroy them all for trying to keep you from fulfilling your passion of DESTRUCTION!

name: Shikokushi: Food and Sightseeing and Beauties
description: In order to avoid the financial failure of Kagawa Prefecture, and aim for traveling around and all-you-can-eat-gourmet, Jiro Urashima, the governor of Kagawa Prefecture, and Deputy Governor, Onohime Megi, will push forward to unify Shikoku!

name: Koma
description: Nonaddictive 30 minutes mind refreshing experience filled with 404zero's live sessions music

name: Lazy Postman
description: Lazy Postman is a top-down 3D runner in which you have not one, or even two, but a dozen main characters that spend all their energy trying to stay at their job. Help couriers not to lose their means of subsistence and prove that a human is better than a robot!

name: Hachi Hachi Mystery
description: Hachi Hachi Mystery is a interactive Visual Novelf taking place at university. It's your first year as a university student and you're going to discover this new life! ...Well, that's how it should have happened.

name: American Theft 80s
description: It's the 80s. Steal vhs players, tapes, classic cars, and if you get caught, outrun the police!

name: Noun Town Language Learning
description: Noun Town Language Learning is the new way to learn a foreign language! Interact, listen, read, and speak your chosen language in a world that regains color as you learn. Test your skills with mini-games & talk to the local villagers. Learn Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, and more…

name: Perfect Affection Plan: Cassiopeia
description: Kaede Uzuki, Everyone loves her, but finds loneliness as an adult to be unbearable. You're a college student who just moved from the next city. You're starting to feel interested in her. There is attraction, and she is thirsty. What are you planning to do to fulfill her thirstiness?

name: Cycles of Aylorea
description:
Strengthen Your Soul, Craft Your Legacy, Rise as a Warden of Aylorea.

An MMORPG with base building, roguelike elements, always on PvP, and other survival elements.

name: Sunrise Tragedy
description: Traverse an old, abandoned cathedral filled with grotesque monsters and bloodthirsty vampires. Overcome relentless enemies and heart-pounding boss fights with your choice of weapons, costumes, and spells in this macabre 2D Action-RPG.

name: Speyarranoth
description: Speyarranoth is a classic sci-fi space asteroid shooter in 3D. You control the game using WASD and shoot with the space key. It's wonderful to just blast full speed through the asteroid fields lasers ablaze and enjoy the explosive light show.

name: DW
description: A story-focused adventure RPG about a boy stranded in a world full of drawings. Explore your way out, help others, and use your disguises and tricks to overcome any obstacles in your way.

name: Our Apartment
description: You're living your daily normal single life when you meet Naomi, a seemingly normal woman at a local café. Some time later, by accident, she suddenly ends up having to live with you! Experience your new day to day life as you build a relationship with her and experiment with new things!

name: Hexonomy
description: Rule the field by creating organizations from the ground up and dominating the economic markets of Hexonomy. Chain together hundreds of businesses to build the most cost efficient economic empire in this chess-like business strategy simulation.

name: TD Worlds
description: TD Worlds is a dynamic, highly strategical game that challenges your skill. Build an impenetrable defense and get ready to plunge into a new, unknown world to uncover its secrets.

name: Bigger Trucks
description: Bigger Trucks is a simulator of big cars that deliver cargo, in off-road conditions.

name: Twin Jump
description: Twins Jump is a miniature reaction speed puzzle game.

name: Vulto
description: Experience a cyberpunk adventure full of strategy, espionage and stealth in the eyes of Engel, a survivor from the collapsed city of Hevland who starts on a journey to become a special agent called Vulto.

name: General War Memories
description: "General War Memories" is a 2.5D style MMO. It allows players to be involved in the endless battle of World War II and allows players to truly feel the scene of World War II.

name: Xenomare
description: Everyone is dead. Your only chance is the escape shuttle... but you need fuel and oxygen. And find the codes for the self-destruct... just hope IT does not find you first.

name: Just a Game to Test Your lQ
description: Wanna know about yourself better? Apply for a free lQ test provided by a Nobei Prize-winning doctor! The world's best experts will visit your house. You just need to solve a simple quiz.

name: Hypnolab VR
description: Join the Dr. Kady Psyche as a new intern at the Ivory Peaks Corporation in her experimental hypnolab! Test out strange devices, alter minds, and push the boundaries of science!

name: Change the World
description: Human belief has the power to change reality. For millennia, alien races have been visiting Earth, gaining supernatural abilities and fantastic wealth by exploiting this remarkable power. But humans are advancing, and many aliens now find themselves leaving Earth with nothing but debts and regrets.

name: Lock Lock: Farm
description: Lock Lock: Farm. Embark on this adventure, fun and relaxing (or not). Surround the animals and capture them. Using only fences, prevent them from being swallowed by dangerous animals, and don't forget to guide them so they can capture the star :).

name: Sausage Dog Tends to Infinity
description: Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity is a classic Sokoban-like 3D puzzle game in which you must stretch yourself to infinity to solve puzzles and uncover ancient wisdom. Learn and grow as you explore a deserted world and discover the answers to questions you have yet to ask.

name: The Running Man
description: If you want to relax, this game is not for you, this game is made to make you rage. go through challenging and hard levels and run to the finish line. will you take the challenge?

name: Unite
description: Unite is a two-player board game based on Lines of Action (a game created in the 1960's). Players take turns moving, trying to connect their pieces. The single-player mode provides 7 difficulty levels. Or play online against an opponent over the network.

name: Metalworking
description: This is a metalworking workshop simulator. He enters the industry and works as a skilled worker. Manage robotic islands. Drive the forklift and procure the raw material. Make a difference with your muscle strength and experience.

name: Sea War
description: Sink all the ships that fire at you! Collect points. A ship game that will not tire you on quarantine days.

name: The Village
description: After you graduated from college, you were assigned to a small village as a doctor.It looks like an ordinary village, but there are many strange things in it.A man knocking at the door in the middle of the night may not be asking for a doctor.The person you saw may not be alive.Haunted?

name: The Light at the End of the Ocean
description: A point-and-click visual novel about unlikely friendship and loss of identity

name: Crowded Blue Dot
description: Crowded Blue Dot is a game about producing various items to make people happy and growing a city from a small village to a metropolis.

name: Research Story
description: Set out to discover and record plants and creatures for the Violet Archive. Grow crops, tame animals, and build the perfect farm! Forge friendships along the way as you begin your life as a researcher!

name: Highway Traffic Racer
description: You need to race through highway traffic where you need to push the acceleration and test your car limits. The best players will receive money accordingly, which you can spend them on upgrades & new cars!

name: EvolveLab
description: Evolve Lab is an online multiplayer game in which you try to descend as deep as possible into the depths of an unknown planet. In each stage you will fight against creatures that were created by other players until you are the first player to reach a new record depth!

name: Asteroids... But Roguelite
description: Start off as a weak ship with a simple attack and fight through waves of enemies, earning currency in order to purchase upgrades for your ship. The never ending waves of enemies grow in number, power, and variety as you progress. Purchase upgrades to keep pace with them.

name: Being Mindful
description: In this awareness game you try to maintain awareness of aspects of your body for as long as you can. Body awareness is practiced sitting, standing, doing yoga, simple tai chi and other exercises.

name: UniDuni
description: Inspired by the classics, UniDuni is a lighthearted puzzle platformer adventure which celebrates the bonds of friendship. Invite a friend to work together across hand-crafted levels or challenge yourself and prove your skills!

name: Let's Learn Shogi
description: From piece movements, to drops, promotion and strategic formations, you'll learn Shogi inside out! Play against a wide variety of AI opponents, developing your Shogi playing style.

name: Merto's Part
description: Merto's Part is a First Person Exploration game. Well..Who is Merto? He is anyone. He is just inside of some situations and he don't know anything. He need to help for choosing true moves. In this story, you will be in Merto's place and trying to find safe-zone for him.

name: Helix Brawl
description: Helix Brawl is a single-player beat em' up action game. Make your way enemy by enemy, beating up bosses and unlocking new powers as you go. Go all or nothing to finish each level, making your way from the underground lab to the CEO's penthouse, wrecking everyone in your wake!

name: Golden Retriever
description: Dig down into the ground and extract as much gold as you can! Prospect, mine, and maintain, all while keeping Dinos at bay. Rocky and Wells are two determined dogs that are new to mining but know how to work hard and have fun at the same time.

name: Warbox
description: A sandbox game that enables players to watch or take part in a warzone. Players will have access to a variety of tools and features that give them access to customize and change the battlefield however they like.

name: Fruit Juice
description: Fruit Juice - a game close to the genre 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: Hyperstar
description: A challenging and action-packed 2D survival shooter. Defend yourself from dangerous enemies by piloting ancient starships, each armed with unique and powerful weaponry.

name: Kitt.Io
description: Can you gain the biggest kitten following?

name: Meditation VR
description: Birds high up in the sky, waves rolling in on the shore, the wind blowing through palm trees and plants that grow on your private secluded island all contribute both visually and in sound to a surreal experience that practically makes you feel the ocean breeze.

name: Flatline
description: Play as Scarlett, a freelance cyborg ninja, in a neon city filled with corporate drones. Use her top of the line sword and bio enhancements to dash throughout the city and chain your dashes through drones. Make sure to watch your health, too many mistakes and you might Flatline.

name: Qbio
description: This is a very cute real-time economic strategy game. Grow plants, level up, unlock new buildings.

name: DressMaker
description: This app lets you make a one-piece (texture) of a 3D avatar made with ‘’Cecil HenShin App” and ”VRoid Studio”. Import VRM and dress up!

name: War War
description: A 4-player multiplayer real-time / turn-based strategy game. Move armies on the board in turn-based mode and invade other armies to enter real-time strategy "skirmish" battles! Win enough small battles to take over the board and win the War!

name: Heroes of Fantasia
description: What dangers lurk in the unknown area? What kind of treasure is buried in the secret darkroom? What adventures will brave warriors encounter on their way to endless mystery? The secret place is waiting for you

name: Ultimate Neural Network
description: Ultimate Neural Network is an interactive 3D live wallpaper. You can control and interact with Neural Networks with your mouse.

name: Animal Drop Safari
description: Animal Drop Safari is the perfect match-3 adventure for nature lovers of all ages. Swap and pop cute and colorful animals to complete each level’s unique challenges.

name: "Draw a card" Simulator
description: You don't even need a board game or a party magician anymore, this simulator will fulfill all your needs!

name: Light and Embers
description: Relax. Listen to the crackle of the fire and the chirping of the birds. Add a log or two if the fire starts to burn out. Enjoy a calm and stress-free campfire.

name: Edge of Elsewhere
description: Guide fledgling alchemist Saskia Hawthorn through her first year at magical university! Craft items, fulfil requests, rub shoulders with the Fae and maybe even date a boy in this otome alchemy dating sim!

name: Halver
description: Halve the blocks into two equal parts and solve the unique puzzles in a game with a blueprint visual style and meditative music

name: Magic Fluids
description: Click the screen and experience an amazing, lifelike simulator of fluid physics that you can interact and play with. Gorgeous visual effects give a out of this world feel. Experiment with infinite configurations, find the perfect one and create beautiful images or just sit back and enjoy the view!

name: Gravity in Space
description: Gravity in Space is an acurate-physics-based spacecraft flight and combat simulation. Learn how to use gravitational forces to navigate through surreal worlds, while you outplay your enemies and shoot them.

name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic - Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Woom
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel's Wolverine
description: Marvel's Wolverine is a standalone game being directed by Brian Horton (creative director) and Cameron Christian (game director), who led the creative efforts on Marvel’s Spider-Man: Miles Morales. In the vein of the Spider-Man games, the goal is to not only respect the DNA of what makes the character so popular, but also look for opportunities to make it feel fresh and truly reflect the Insomniac spirit.

name: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End - Remastered
description: A remastered version of Uncharted 4: A Thief's End included in the Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection. It features multiple graphical options with varying framerates and resolutions, faster load times and DualSense haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy - Remastered
description: A remastered version of Uncharted: The Lost Legacy included in the Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection. It features multiple graphical options with varying framerates and resolutions, faster load times and DualSense haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection
description:
Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection is a remastered collection of two games in the Uncharted saga: Uncharted 4: A Thief’s End and Uncharted: The Lost Legacy.

This includes multiple graphical options with varying framerates and resolutions, faster load times and DualSense haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: Fantastic Contraption
description:
The original 2008 2D physics building game! With over 1.5 million players, Fantastic Contraption is a true classic.

Your goal is simple: move the red ball from the blue building zone to the pink goal area.

Your tools: wood rods (solid), water rods (pass through stuff), and wheels that turn clockwise or counterclockwise.

Your solutions: NEAR INFINITE. Players have saved over 10 million unique designs, solving levels with everything from cars to catapults to conveyor belts or just pure gravity.

name: No More Rainbows
description:
No More Rainbows brings the fun of a classic platformer to VR. Use the intuitive locomotion mechanics to run, jump, and climb using only your hands.

As the Beast, rampage through colorful worlds to reclaim your desecrated Underworld. Extend your experience with 3v3 multiplayer game mode to become the world’s most respected beast!

name: Idol Queens Production
description:
An idol making simulation game, Idol Queens!

Produce your own idols in the way the real k-pop idols are produced!

name: M.I.C.E.
description:
The moon has run out of cheese!

Join the forces of the Massive Interplanetary Cheesefinding Expedition (M.i.C.E.), pillage all the cheese and precious Cheesemaking Organisms of Wholesome Sustenance (C.O.W.S.) you can for the glory of the lunar rodent nation!

Player 1, move with the arrow keys, Player 2 move with WASD

name: Aloners
description:
One day, the last man on Earth came home to find a girl sleeping on his bed.

This is a free to play Visual-Novel by Sonnet009

name: Super
description: Super is a battle royale filled with superheroes and supervillains in the city of Centropolis. Start as a regular citizen and find a crystal to obtain your super powers and help the villains make money or the heroes stop them!

name: Color Connect
description: Color Connect is a fun VR puzzle game with an immersive environment and a relaxing ambient playlist to suit. Lose yourself in space with over 50+ challenging levels, putting your gray matter to the test. It's simple to learn but challenging to master!

name: Bubble Shooter FX
description:
Bubble Shooter FX is a classic bubble shoot game.

This addictive classic bubble blast match-three game comes with clean and modern graphics, hundreds of great challenging levels and some nice special items for better game experience in harder levels.

Clean and simple 3D graphics with nice light effects gives the game a special touch.

name: Brink Traveler
description: BRINK Traveler is a virtual travel experience that takes you to amazing natural locations in full 3D to feel like you're really there. Step into a postcard and visit some of the most breathtaking places on Earth today!

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 7
description: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s conservation challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before!

name: HyperFleet
description: Prepare for a challenge you'll never forget! Race against the clock at breakneck speeds through 42 unique levels, all while performing insane aerial acrobatics. Features fast-paced and addictive gameplay that will have you constantly thinking three steps ahead.

name: Droopy Balls Simulator 2021
description: Can you keep your balls out of the water, all the while dodging poop, piss, and more! Droopy Ball Simulator 2021 will be the test of that! Keep that sack in control!

name: Bloopy & Droopy
description: A Game Boy style 8-bit platformer, giving you an old-school experience in which you can switch characters at any time and use your digging skills to make your way through the terrain!

name: Beat Arena
description: Strum, strike, and jam away! Liven up your VR gig! Perform on stage in a band as a pianist, a guitarist, a bassist or a drummer, all in VR! Grab your friends' play data and enjoy a VR jam session together! Perform your favorite songs from the BEMANI series in VR!

name: Warring States
description: An online social game about war, teamwork, and deception for 2-4 players.

name: Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles - Chapter 3
description: Experience the third chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Directly following the horrific discoveries in the underground laboratory, you'll face an all new story chapter as Lydia continues to fight for survival. Includes additional content for the Battle Mode.

name: Draknek and Friends Puzzle Bundle
description: From some of the best puzzle designers in the world comes the Draknek and Friends Puzzle Bundle, a collection of four of the best puzzle games in the last decade. With dozens of hours of fun, this bundle is a must-have for puzzle fans. Headlining the bundle is critically beloved A Monster’s Expedition, an open world puzzle game about exploring the museum of Human Englandland. Players of all skill levels can enjoy hundreds of islands - some right in front of you, others well off the beaten track for true puzzle lovers In Cosmic Express, create pathways to navigate the galaxy’s most awkward space colony. It's cute, harder than it looks, and guaranteed to give you hours of challenging fun across hundreds of levels. In A Good Snowman is Hard to Build, players can continue exploring the world of A Monster’s Expedition while rolling up snowballs to become snowfriends. The easiest and most accessible of the four games, this game is a delight for all ages. In Sokobond, move atoms to form increasingly complex molecules through over one hundred levels of challenging puzzles in Draknek’s first commercial release.

name: Arcade Archives: Pop Flamer
description: Pop Flamer is an action game released by Jaleco in 1982. Players control the Pop Flamer to defeat monsters as they pop all the balloons in each stage. You'll need to refuel your flamethrower by popping balloons, since the flames get weaker each time you use it.

name: Detective Solitaire: The Ghost Agency
description: 200 magical layouts - find all the evidence! Visit a magical world right now!

name: Sick
description: Sick is a mixture of intense thriller and exploration of a small surrounding world. A first-person game with a frightening atmosphere. Once in Hell, you play as Jack Willis, who roams an endless loop of suffering, pain and fear.

name: Way Walkers: University
description: Embark on a magical adventure through a spiritual world.

name: Pinku Kult: Hex Mortis
description: Welcome to RAZORE CITY – a desolate, grim metropolis with one big problem: DEMONS. Control your own Razore City denizen as you investigate bizarre happenings around the city and track down the mastermind behind it all in this narrative-based RPG!

name: Labyrinthus: Episode 1
description: Can you trust your own memory? Here a maze that you should escape with your survival skils. Find the correct ways, keys ,codes and lastly watch out for evil spirits!

name: Flame Keeper
description: Flame Keeper is dynamic action rogue-lite game with stylized graphic and responsive combat system. Explore various lands, fight enemies, gather energy and keep fire burning.

name: Grappin
description: After a difficult awakening, you stumble upon the Grip, a mysterious artifact and grappling hook. Climb up the Mountain to bring back the Grip to the top and unravel the mystery surrounding the Grip. Bon voyage!

name: Winter's Trumpet
description: A short interactive love story set against the backdrop of an 1918 flu inspired epidemic.

name: Sputnik
description: Sputnik is an indie arcade space game where player needs to repair old Soviet Union Space Settlements. It's a singleplayer game with cyberpunk style graphics and real retro feel. Gameplay is based on old school games from 1980's and 1990's with lives and permadeath.

name: Honkstory 2: There was No 1
description: You can't stop the funny, in this retro beat-em up platformer, featuring 20 unique levels, each with their own retrostyle music. 5 challenging bosses, that is sure to give one a memorable experience.

name: Liquidation: Echoes of the Past
description: LIQUIDATION is a tactical RTS in which you take the role of a commander to bring back balance to the war-torn world of Veá.

name: Perfect Decision
description: 「Perfect decision」 is a 2D strategic business simulation game with real estate as its theme. Here, you will choose different types of characters, use different types of companies, recruit different types of employees, and use different means to make profits in different types of cities!

name: Plushie from the Sky
description: A charming souls-like hack & slash. Play as a little fallen angel, explore dreamy landscapes, shoot down corrupted monsters and fight challenging bosses with a plushie.

name: Elite Commander
description: You are a well trained elite member of special weapons and tactics teams.

name: Tocovix
description: Place Crosses on the game board and complete Shapes. Earn Stops to block your opponents and make your way to victory! Play with your friends on the same device or challenge other players Online.

name: 1976: Back to Midway
description: Are you ready to travel back in time to 1943 and relive the excitement of classic arcade dogfights? Now, thanks to Virtual Reality, you’re about to discover a new level of immersion and spectacularity, while retaining the original essence and fun.

name: Inside Explorer: Mummy with figurines
description: The scans of this mummified man tells us about late Egyptian burial practices, from the placement of his hands to figurines he was buried with.

name: Inside Explorer: The Gilded Lady
description: Inside Explorer: The Gilded Lady DLC offers an epic exploration of a real ancient mummy from the Field Museum's collection.

name: Bordercide
description: Witness the story of a detective struggling with mental issues as he chases after a serial killer. In this noir-themed top-down shooter game, you can use your character’s abilities and create your own gameplay style as you progress through levels with a wide variety of enemies.

name: Lava Escape Mine
description: Escape the volcanic mine. Red hot magma is now pouring into the underground mining complex. You must escape the mine before the magma catches up to you in virtual reality.

name: House of God
description: As The House of God races towards heaven, Jack blasts their way to the conductor in this chaotic and fast-paced Rogue-Lite.

name: Cubelz: Cars
description: Heat at full throttle and a new system through the points. That is the motto of the DLC "Cubelz Cars". Let yourself be seduced by lovingly designed levels and heat up between obstacles.

name: What Time Is It
description: In order to get the time without using the extreme, looking for suspicious items around, crack the heavy fog!

name: Your Chronicle
description: "Let's begin your own story." This is a text-based idle RPG game. There are 1,500+ actions here. It's still growing.

name: Break Sky
description: You received a distress signal from a distance, but when you reached this huge spacecraft, you found no one.

name: Space Mining
description: Space Mining is a game of strategy and deck building! Winning games will give you new cards, and powerful equipments for special bonuses in the match! You can play solo, sharing the screen or play ON-LINE to challenge new opponents or against AI. An innovative gameplay for a brand new card game!

name: Fright Chasers: Thrills, Chills and Kills - Collector's Edition
description: Can you stop a mysterious monster terrorizing a new amusement park?

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Minor Factions
description: Add a whole new strategic dimension with the Minor Factions DLC! Compete against your enemies to exert control over upstart forces that have emerged outside the boundaries of the great powers.

name: SoulCalibur VI: Tira
description: Access to the playable character Tira in the full retail version of SOULCALIBUR VI. The pack also includes a unique story for Tira in the Soul Chronicle mode.

name: SoulCalibur VI: 2B
description: Joining the cast of SOULCALIBUR VI is the combat android 2B (YoRHa No. 2 Type B) from Square Enix's NieR: Automata! Jump and dash around your opponent to pull off swift attacks and deadly air combos!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Amy
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Amy!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Cassandra
description: Celebrate 20 years of Soulcalibur with an all new playable character: Cassandra!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Hilde
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Hilde!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Haohmaru
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Haohmaru!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Setsuka
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Setsuka!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Hwang
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Hwang!

name: Train Sim World 2: Cane Creek: Thompson - Potash Route
description: Journey through the American West's awe-inspiring, rugged, and remote desert scenery while tackling heavy tonnage and daunting grades with the Union Pacific Cane Creek Subdivision route for Train Sim World 2!

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Heavy Freight Pack Loco
description: This bumper double-loco pack brings iconic and historic heavy freight operations to the Northern Trans-Pennine route. Experience a bygone era of freight haulage as you move thousands of tons of fuel and goods over the challenging Trans-Pennine grades.

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 101 Loco
description: The DB BR 101 is a classic among the modern electric locomotives of Germany, with heritage spanning some of the nation's most revolutionary designs and continuing the honour by working throughout the Deutsche Bahn network every day. Experience this icon for yourself in Train Sim World 2!

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Class 31 Loco
description: After having a career spanning decades, and a successful life in preservation, it's time to turn back the clock and experience the iconic BR Class 31 in its heyday in Train Sim World 2!

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 363 Loco
description: Climb aboard classic diesel traction and get shunting in the Ruhr Valley with Train Sim World 2's DB BR 363!

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 204 Loco
description: A hard-working classic comes to life in Train Sim World 2 with the stunning DB BR 204 diesel locomotive!

name: Train Sim World 2: CSX C40-8W Loco
description: As created for Train Sim World 2, the General Electric C40-8W is richly detailed and features realistic controls and operating performance. The powerful locomotive wears CSX's attractive YN2 livery and is authentically suited for duty on Sand Patch Grade.

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Class 33 Loco
description: The Train Sim World 2 BR Class 33 now joins the BR Class 47 and BR Class 09 to further bring to life the heritage festivities of the West Somerset Railway route's diesel gala.

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Class 20 'Chopper' Loco
description: A veteran in every right, the Class 20 has earned its place among enthusiasts' hearts; and now Type 1 traction comes to life in Train Sim World 2, ready for hard-working duty on the Tees Valley Line!

name: Train Sim World 2: LIRR M3 EMU Loco
description: Take the controls of a "Big Apple" railroading classic with the Long Island Rail Road M3 electric-multiple-unit (EMU) for Train Sim World 2!

name: WRC 5: WRC - eSports Pack 1
description: Put your driving talents to the test with these 7 new races for WRC 5 and discover the WRC Concept Car E1, a brand new car. This content can be used in Quick Rally and Quick Stage modes.

name: WRC 5: WRC - eSports Pack 2
description: Put your driving talents to the test with these 6 new races for WRC 5 and discover the WRC Concept Car E2, a brand new car. This content can be used in Quick Rally and Quick Stage modes.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Legendary Pack 1
description: Play as Pikkon from the movie "Dragon Ball Z: Fusion Reborn", and Toppo (God of Destruction) from DRAGON BALL Super in Legendary Pack 1.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Ultra Pack 1
description: Play as Ribrianne from Universe 2, and new Saiyan Prince forms with Ultra Pack 1.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Pack 1
description:
Extand your experience with new exciting content! 2 new playable characters: Cabbe (with his Super Saiyan transformation) and Frost (Final Form)
1 new master: Hit
5 new attacks
3 new Parallel Quests
2 new costumes
5 Super Souls
2 emotes

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Pack 2
description:
Expand your experience with new exciting content! 2 new playable characters: Champa and Vados New story quests from DRAGON BALL SUPER!
1 Additional Stage
8 New Attacks
3 New Costumes
1 Additional Vehicle Super Souls and Emotes!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Pack 3
description:
Get your hands on new super content, including powerful characters from "Future Trunks" arc of DRAGON BALL SUPER!
• 3 Additional Characters (Goku Black Rosé, Zamasu, Bojack)
• 3 New Parallel Quests
• 5 Additional Skills
• 4 Additional Costumes
• 5 Super Souls
• 2 Emotes
• Bojack as a Master

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Pack 4
description: Keep on enhancing your DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 experience with new exciting content from the "Future Trunks Saga" of DRAGON BALL SUPER!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Extra DLC Pack 1
description:
This Extra Pack 1 is the perfect content to enhance your experience with a lot of new elements:
• 4 new powerful characters: Dabra, Buu (Gohan absorbed), Tapion and Android 13
• Zamasu as a new Master
• 5 New Parallel Quests
• 4 New Costumes
• 13 New Skills
• 8 New Super Souls

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Extra DLC Pack 2
description:
This Extra Pack 2 is the perfect content to enhance your experience with a lot of new elements:
• 4 new powerful characters (including Jiren, Fu and Android 17)
• Exclusive New Scenario
• 5 New Parallel Quests
• 2 New Costumes
• 8 New Skills
• 8 New Super Souls

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Extra DLC Pack 4
description: Grasp the power of the movie “Dragon Ball Super: Broly” with the Extra Pack 4.

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Raven
description: Get your hands on this deadly and alluring sniper. Downloading the Raven Pack will add an exclusive version of Raven to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Raven brings her beloved sniper rifle along and is a great addition to any team!

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Ivan
description: Bolster your ranks with Ivan and blast your enemies with heavy machinegun fire! Downloading the Ivan Pack will add an elite version of Ivan to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Ivan brings his heavy machinegun with him and will increase your team's firepower massively !

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Shadow
description: Let Shadow sneak up on your enemies and take them out quickly and quietly.Downloading the Shadow Pack will add an elite version of Shadow to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Employ Shadows superior stealth ability to your team and dish out deadly damage!

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Echo
description: Add the resourceful Echo to your mercenary company, permanently! With her ability to spot far away enemies and incredible accuracy she will take out the opposition ninja-style!

name: Rover Mechanic Challenge: ERC Competition
description: 𝗘𝗥𝗖 𝗥𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗶𝗰 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗲 is an e-tournament based on the world's only simulator for repairing Mars Rovers. Take part in solving challenging tasks and become the master of leader board.

name: Senalux: Level Pack 3
description: The 3rd Senalux Level Pack adds another 6 Stages with a total of 72 levels and introduces 7 new optical / optoelectrical components.

name: Senalux: Level Pack 4
description: The 4th Senalux Level Pack adds another 6 Stages with a total of 72 levels and introduces an additional mechanic as well as 4 new optical components.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Samurai Predator
description: From the hunting grounds of feudal Japan, this demon from legend once hunted skilled warriors who protected their island nation.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - City Hunter Predator
description: From the concrete jungle of Los Angeles, emerge from the shadows as the City Hunter – the new premium Predator class from the iconic 1990 film.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Dutch 2025 DLC Pack
description: Hunt the Predator as Major Alan 'Dutch' Schaefer with this premium Fireteam skin. The Dutch 2025 skin features the legendary character, 38 years after his first encounter with the Predator, aged, battle-scarred and ready to hunt.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Isabelle Fireteam DLC Pack
description: Play as the elite sniper Isabelle, featuring the look and voice of Alice Braga.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Viking Predator
description: Viking raiders consumed lands far from their own borders, and by doing so managed to draw attention they never imagined.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Dutch '87
description: Play as Major Alan ‘Dutch’ Schaefer with this premium Fireteam character, complete with his iconic voice and look from his first encounter with the Predator in the original 1987 film.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Valkyrie Predator DLC Pack
description: To have your trophy claimed by the Valkyrie Predator was seen as a great honor, said to guarantee your passage to Valhalla. Many fought against her in search of glory, but none could best her cunning speed and the force of her god-like weaponry.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Dante "Beast Mode" Jefferson
description: Charge into the hunt as Dante “Beast Mode” Jefferson, featuring the iconic look and voice lines of the legendary running back Marshawn Lynch.

name: Endless Legend: Echoes of Auriga
description: Additional soundtracks for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game, featuring 7 new tracks composed and produced by FlybyNo. Includes exclusive unit equipments inspired by the Echoes of Auriga.

name: Endless Legend: Forgotten Love Add-on
description: An add-on for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game. Adds Irjsko Lasmak and Bayari Kulaa to cast of heroes. This content was unlocked to celebrate the Make War Not Love 4 community event.

name: Endless Legend: The Lost Tales
description: The Lost Tales features additional storytelling content for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game, featuring more than 20 new quests which gives players exclusive insights about the game's minor factions.

name: Bear, Vodka, Balalaika: Cyberpunk
description: The year is 2177 takes place in the Night City Arena, obsessed with power, glamour and bright neon signs. The streets are full of cyborgs. You have unlimited ammunition, the main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and survive.

name: Hero Siege: Wrath of Mevius
description:
The Wrath of Mevius - Expansion SetFight your way through Astral Plains, Corrupted Deserts to the Mansion of Mevius and face him in an epic battle that determines the fate of mankind!
- Unlocks ACT VII
- New enemies
- New Bosses
- New relic pool
- New Classes (Demon Slayer & Demonspawn)
Gunslinger skills
Executioner...

name: Gloom: Unhappy Homes
description: Home is where the heart is buried beneath the floorboards. New cards, new rules, and a new family in this deadly expansion! Make everyone suffer even more.

name: LEGO The Hobbit: Side Quest Character Pack
description: New surprise characters await when you take time to explore the hidden secrets of Middle-earth! Take command of a LEGO Big Figure River Troll or Girion, a brave Lord of Dale. The noble Elk will offer you transport wherever you desire, or you can charge into battle with the fearless Dwarf soldier.

name: LEGO The Hobbit: The Big Little Character Pack
description:
Highlighting a few miniature versions of big fan favorites, The Big Little Character Pack is sure to deliver a fun take on some famous Middle-earth residents! Strike a little fear and terror into the hearts of your foes with Baby Smaug, or enjoy a cameo appearance of Baby Gimli from The Lord of the Rings trilogy.

The LEGO Big Figure Snow Troll is sure to shake things up and you’ll also have the chance to play as Bandobras “Bullroarer” Took or a Stone Dwarf from Erebor. If you find yourself weary of travel by foot, take a ride on the Spider. Remember: it’s not about the journey itself, but rather the experience we have with those we take along with us!

name: LEGO The Hobbit: The Battle Pack
description: The land of Middle-earth is full of danger, but the items in our latest pack guarantee you’re prepared for battle. Destroy Morgul LEGO with the Shadow Sword, equip yourself with Jeweled Mithril Armor of the finest Dwarven craftsmanship, or activate the Light Orb Shield for the ultimate protection.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Spider-Man Character Pack
description: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers includes 8 new characters and outfits: Spider-Man, Peter Parker, Spider-Man (Miles Morales), Miles Morales, Spider-Man (Civil War), Iron Spider, Scarlet Spider, and Spider-Girl.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Marvel's Captain America - Civil War Character Pack
description: This pack features 9 playable characters inspired by the 2016 film Captain America: Civil War.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Classic Guardians of the Galaxy Character Pack
description: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters from the classic composition of the Guardians of the Galaxy: Charlie-27, Major Astro, Martinex, Yondu, Starhawk, Aleta Ogord, and Nikki.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Marvel's Ant-Man and the Wasp Level and Character Pack
description: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters and a level from the 2018 Marvel Studio's Ant-Man and the Wasp film.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Marvel's Avengers - Infinity War Level and Character Pack
description: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters and a level from the 2018 Marvel Studio's Avengers: Infinity War film.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Agents of Atlas Character Pack
description: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes Jimmy Woo, Gorilla-Man, M-11, The Uranian, and Venus.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Marvel's Black Panther Movie Character and Level Pack
description: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters and a level from the 2018 Marvel Studio's Black Panther film.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Out of Time Character Pack
description: This character pack includes for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 adds Iron Man 2020, Lady Spider, Nosferata, Captain Assyria, Warmaker, Hulk 2099, and Daredevil Noir.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Batman of the Future Character Pack
description: Set in the future, a new hero must rise to defend Gotham City again. Control the new Batman, Terry McGinnis, with his Batsuit that allows him to fly and even turn invisible. Players can also access villains including Blight as well as Joker himself.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Man of Steel
description: Help Jor-El, his wife Lara and their robot Kelex send the infant Superman into space towards the safety of Earth as Krypton falls. Find a way inside Jor-El’s home, fight General Zod’s invading forces and battle against Zod himself to save Superman.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Heroines and Villainesses Character Pack
description: Celebrating the fearless females of DC Comics, this collection of super heroines and villainesses features Raven, Starfire, Batwoman and more!

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Batman 75th Anniversary
description: Play as Joker and Harley Quinn, setting up a variety of celebration set pieces. Be the Dark Knight and play as some of the most iconic faces of Batman through the years, including his first appearance in Detective Comics #27.

name: The LEGO Movie Videogame: Wild West Pack
description: It’s a rip-roarin' good time in the wild, wild west! Get a chock-full of laughs and abilities with these special pants. Spin around and attract more studs with the Tornado Pants. Put on your Prospector Pants and spawn more high-value studs. Get all fired up with the Hot Pants and jump higher with the Jack Rabbit Pants. There's even more action with new characters: Old Ollie, Wild Will, Sudds Backwash and Rootbeer Belle.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Silent Hill
description: Silent Hill is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Hell Let Loose: Lethal Tide DLC
description: Unlock access to the Lethal Tide DLC.

name: X-Plane 10 Global: Carenado - PA34 200T Seneca II
description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

name: X-Plane 10 Global: Europe Scenery
description: X-Plane 10 Global - 64 Bit - Europe Scenery is a free optional DLC that you can activated thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Europe Scenery.

name: X-Plane 10 Global: Carenado - B58 Baron
description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.
